HTML:
Si eres un apasionado de los Datos y estás buscando nuevos retos profesionales, tenemos los proyectos que estás buscando.


Nuestra Comunidad Data & Analytics no para de crecer y necesitamos incorporar un equipo de ANALISTAS DE DATOS y/o CONSULTORES BI que estén listos para un nuevo desafío. Es necesaria experiencia trabajando con PowerBI.


Se podrá teletrabajar 100% en remoto.


¿Qué esperamos de ti?



¿Qué estamos buscando en ti?

  • Experiencia mínima de 4 años en elaboración de informes en PowerBI.
  • Conocimientos de modelado de datos DWH
  • Modelado y limpieza de datos con Power Query.
  • Elaboración y mantenimiento de informes.
  • Comprobación de datos con SQL Server.
  • Buenas experiencia en leguaje DAX.
  • Valorable: Azure, Snowflake, DBT

¿Qué esperamos de ti?

  • Autonomía y responsabilidad en la ejecución de tareas y compromisos.
  • Dinamismo para abordar las tareas complejas.
  • Proactividad para identificar mejoras y aplicar las mejores prácticas en sus soluciones.
  • Analizar los requerimientos de los proyectos por parte del cliente, y enfocarse en la parte de análisis y desarrollo de dashboards en Power BI.



Y además, que más te ofrecemos?


· 22 días de vacaciones, 2 días de libre disposición + 24 y 31 de Diciembre (cierre de empresa)


·Te podrás beneficiar de un completo programa de beneficios y descuentos (ocio, tecnología, bienestar y salud). ¿Quieres ejemplos? Tienes infinitas posibilidades desde contratar Gympass o Fisio-Empresas, pasando por ofertas en móviles y portátiles, hasta descuentos para irte de viaje, reservar un vuelo o pillar un alquiler de coche ¡Tú elijes!


·Acceso y formación en todo tipo de conocimiento técnico, habilidades o idiomas.


·Participación en eventos tecnológicos. Nosotros somos patrocinadores de eventos como el Codemotion, t3chfest y sobre todo estamos orgullosos de ser los organizadores de eventos técnicos como el blockchain spain y DevOps Spain.


·Nos acordamos de ti en los momentos importantes de tu vida (aniversario de trabajo, cumpleaños y nacimiento). ¡Tienes sorpresa asegurada!


·Vamos más allá del trabajo, por eso nos gusta organizar los Family days, para que te diviertas con tu familia en knowmad mood.


·Tienes acceso a nuestros meetups, techdays y a nuestro blog tecnológico ¿Todavía no conoces https://enmilocalfunciona.io/?


·Actividades de Teambuilding: Nos gusta divertirnos y estar en contacto con nuestros


Trabajamos en entornos agile, flexible, con máxima conciliación y teletrabajo y equipos horizontales de trabajo con una cultura de colaboración, compromiso e innovación.


En knowmad mood nos rodeamos de un buen ambiente y buena gente, donde se rema en la misma dirección para que todas las personas desarrollen su carrera profesional. Somos un ecosistema de talento y de oportunidades, podrás dirigir tu desarrollo profesional y tener conversaciones con tus responsables para localizar experiencias profesionales que consoliden tus nuevos conocimientos.


Si te identificas con estos valores, no lo dudes y únete a nuestro equipo!

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
It takes the brightest minds to be a technology leader. It takes imagination to create green energy for the generations to come. At Siemens Gamesa we make real what matters, join our global team.

Siemens Gamesa has a vision for renewable energy: we believe in the power of nature and technology. Help us to be ready to face the energy challenges of tomorrow and make a green footprint – join the team in creating a better future for us on our planet.

We focus on hiring the best people, wherever they may be in the world. We pride ourselves on the flexibility we offer to our employees and are committed to building a workforce that can grow with the company. Siemens Gamesa is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

In our culture of trust, we focus on empowerment, diversity and continuous learning. Valuing our people is what makes us one global team, with our colleagues’ safety at the heart of our organization.

How To Contribute To Our Vision

As our Data Analyst in PPA you research, analyze, consolidate and interpret data using statistical and data analytics methods, providing our internal customers full insight on product reliability, quality and performance, end-to-end throughout the whole value chain. Within a cross-functional team, you manage the alignment with our interfaces and stakeholders within TE and across SGRE, especially in the Business Units and the Corporate Quality function.

Mission Of The Function

PPA’s mission is ensure a robust, sustainable, and effective approach of bringing awareness on design- and product quality to the TE organization, allowing them to prioritize efforts based on business impact criteria’s and thereby ensuring SGRE can launch high quality products on the market.

Main Responsibilities Of The Position Are


Drive consolidation of product reliability, quality and performance data from various data sources throughout the value chain (manufacturing, installation, commissioning, service)
Be the focal point inside within our Technology team regarding reliability and quality KPIs, developing the technical knowledge across the product platforms
Validate and interpret data to provide context to product quality and performance KPIs, identify trends and correlations, as well as financial implications
Analyze fleet data, support product designers to identify measures to ensure required reliability
Create reports and communicate to various stakeholders (e.g. product platform managers and TE management), ensuring awareness on design- and product quality
Collaborate with data analysts in teams across the company


Position Qualifications And Required Skills


Academic degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Data Science, Business Analytics or similar
Work experience of 2-5 years in data analytics
International work experience e.g., as part of an international project team or working abroad including strong English proficiency
General broad understanding of- and interest in technology and underlying principles
Good communication skills are required to discuss analysis and results.


What You Need To Make a Difference


Analytical mind with a problem-solving attitude and strong communication- and project management skills
You are committed to deadlines and show ownership on your assignments
You are Team-player with a can-do attitude, open to feedback from peers and managers and willingness to learn and develop
You must be able to work independently in cross-functional initiatives with a variety of stakeholders and work effectively at all levels in an organization
You have a strong quality and result orientation


In return of your commitment we offer you…


Become a part of our mission for sustainability: Clean energy for generations to come
A global team of diverse colleagues who share passion for renewable energy
Trust and empowerment to make your own ideas reality
Personal and professional development to grow internally within our organization
Flexible working hours as well as home-office (depending on the position, legal entity or responsibilities)
Attractive remuneration package
Local benefits such as subsided lunch, employee discounts and much more


Empowering our people

https://www.siemensgamesa.com/sustainability/employees

How do you imagine the future?

https://youtu.be/12Sm678tjuY

Our global team is on the front line of tackling the climate crisis, reducing carbon emissions – the greatest challenge we face.

Severely disabled applicants are encouraged to reach out to us. We have inclusive recruiting processes specifically for severely disabled persons in Spain and we do our utmost to tailor working spaces to suit your individual needs. In cases of severe disability, applicants who are equally qualified will be given preferential consideration.

Siemens Gamesa is an equal opportunity employer and maintains a work environment that is free from discrimination and where employees are treated with dignity and respect. Employment at Siemens Gamesa is based solely on an individual's merit and qualifications, which are directly related to job competence. Siemens Gamesa does not discriminate against any employee or job applicant on the basis of race, ethnicity, nationality, ancestry, genetic information, citizenship, religion, age, gender, gender identity/expression, sexual orientation, pregnancy, marital status, disability or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, rules or regulations. We adhere to these principles in all aspects of employment, including recruiting, hiring, training, compensation, promotion and benefits.



We are driven by people - from more than 100 different countries, they build the company we are every day. Our diverse and inclusive culture encourages us to think outside the box, speak without fear, and be bold. We value the flexibility that our smart-working arrangements, our digital disconnection framework and our family-friendly practices bring to the new way of working.
Show more

Title: Business Data Analyst
Description:
We’re looking for a talented Business Data Analyst to help us change the world of digital advertising!




WHO WE ARE

Seedtag is the leading Contextual Advertising Platform. Our proprietary, machine learning-based technology provides human-like understanding of the content in the web, the highest level of brand safety in the industry and unmatched cookieless targeting capabilities.

We engage with the market on both demand and supply side to create, activate and launch high-quality advertising campaigns at scale. We are committed to creating a more beautiful, respectful and engaging way to do advertising.




KEY FIGURES

2014 · Founded by two ex-Googlers

2018 · 16M total turnover & Internationalization & Getting growth

2021 · Fundraising round of 40M€ & +10 countries & +230 Seedtaggers

2022 · Fundraising round of 250M€ + expansion into the U.S market + 400 Seedtaggers




YOUR CHALLENGE

You will get full ownership of our business data, and will be expected to propose and conduct analyses that transform Seedtag’s data into significant business opportunities and KPI improvements.
You will analyze the performance of our current Contextual products and processes and proactively propose initiatives that seek to improve Seedtag’s commercial and operational results.
You will develop tools that automate internal processes, increasing efficiency and efficacy of Seedtag teams.
You will help build tools that enable the democratization of data inside the company, and allow Seedtag teams to make informed, data-driven decisions.
Finally, you will build a solid knowledge of the adTech ecosystem and develop strong business acumen.




YOU WILL SUCCEED IN THIS ROLE IF

You have a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Business, Economics, Mathematics, Computer Science or Engineering. Specific certifications / education in Data / Business Intelligence are a plus.
You have 3-5 years of experience in a fast-paced environment, either start-up, corporate or consulting.
You have advanced skills in SQL for data extraction, transformation, and analysis.
You have experience with ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes and tools.
You have knowledge of database management systems (e.g., BigQuery, MySQL).
You have experience working with programming languages such as Python or R for data analysis and manipulation.
You have experience in data visualization tools such as Looker, Power BI, or similar and you have knowledge of Excel/ Sheets.
You have strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to translate complex data into actionable insights that drive business value.
You have the ability to collaborate with business stakeholders to identify information needs and define business requirements.
You have excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to convey complex data concepts to non-technical stakeholders




It would be a big plus if you

Have experience in forecasting, trend analysis, and predictive modeling
Have previous experience in presenting and communicating data analysis results and insights to external stakeholders




SEEDTAG PERKS

🚀 Key moment to join Seedtag in terms of growth and opportunities

💯 One Seedtag: Work for a month from any of our open offices with travel and stay paid if you’re a top performer (think of Brazil, Mexico..., 🏖️)

🍽️🚘 Access to a flexible benefits plan with restaurant, transportation, and kindergarten tickets and discounts on medical insurance

⌛ Flexible schedule to balance work and personal life

🏋 Gympass

🇬🇧 🇪🇸 🇫🇷 Optional company-paid English, Spanish and/or French courses

📚 Access to learning opportunities (learning & development budget)

🍻 We love what we do, but we also love having fun. We have many team activities you can join and enjoy with your colleagues!




BENEFITS OF WORKING AT SEEDTAG

Growth: International, highly demanding work environment in one of the fastest growing AdTech companies in Europe. We reject "that’s the way it’s always been done". In Seedtag you can find an energetic, fresh workplace, multicultural work environment where our members are from different countries in Europe, LATAM, US and so many more!
Impact: The chance to have a direct impact, here you don't work for the sake of working, we all have an impact on seedtag in our own way, rowing in the same direction.
Diversity of methodology and people: Seedtag DNA is unique and highly appreciated by very different types of Seedtagers. We embrace diversity and encourage everyone to seek the best version of themselves and to show who they really are. With a total flexible methodology.
Flexibility: At Seedtag, we trust you, you can work from home, the beach or the office. The important thing is to work on your goals.




Are you ready to join the SEEDTAG adventure? Then send us your CV!

Title: Analista Power BI
Description:
¡En Ayesa crecemos juntos/as!




Cada profesional de nuestra empresa es importante para nosotros/as, nos ayudan a crecer de manera diversa y gracias a ellos/as somos más de 11.000 personas trabajando con el mismo objetivo en más de 40 países. ¡Únete a la multinacional española tecnológica referente en el mundo!




Si eres una persona con vocación por la tecnología y quieres continuar con tu desarrollo profesional, a la vez que concilias tu vida profesional y personal… ¡Este es tu sitio!




En esta ocasión buscamos ampliar nuestro equipo con un/a Analista Power BI que quiera continuar construyendo el futuro con nosotros/as desde📍Madrid en modalidad híbrida (disponibilidad otras zonas geográficas)




¡Anímate a dar el salto! ¡Te estamos esperando!




Funciones:

Te incorporarás para a un equipo multidisciplinar dentro de un proyecto de un cliente del sector asegurador. El perfil que buscamos un perfil de Analista de Power BI.




Requisitos mínimos:

Grado en ingeniería informática/software/industrial.
3 años de experiencia mínima y 2 al menos en Power BI




Requisito deseado:

Certificaciones en Power BI







¿Qué te ofrecemos?

¡Llega hasta donde tú quieras! El Programa “Desarróllate en Ayesa” te ayudará a marcar tu itinerario de futuro anualmente.




Contamos con políticas que facilitan la conciliación entre la vida profesional y personal: Flexibilidad horaria, modelo híbrido de trabajo y Hotdesk (Smart Job) y jornada intensiva en verano.




Uno de nuestros pilares es la actualización de nuestros/as profesionales, por ello proporcionamos formación técnica, certificaciones y formación en idiomas.




¿Quieres encaminar tu trayectoria profesional hacia la gestión de equipo? Ayesa Management Program nos ayuda a identificar tu talento.




Proceso de revisión salarial anual.




Plan Familia.




Plan Ayesa Bienestar 360 con descuentos en viajes, tecnología, formación, deporte, belleza y ¡muchos más!




Atendiendo a la Ley Orgánica 3/2007, de 22 de marzo, y en concordancia con lo dispuesto en los RD 901/2020 y 902/2020, de 13 de octubre, la empresa se ha marcado como objetivo promover la defensa y aplicación del principio de igualdad entre hombres y mujeres, evitando cualquier tipo de discriminación laboral por razón de sexo, garantizando así las mismas oportunidades de ingreso. Adicionalmente, en Ayesa apostamos por la igualdad de oportunidades y por la integración laboral de personas con diversidad funcional.

Title: Data Analyst, Finance & Strategy
Description:
About Gelato

Gelato has built the world's largest and most global network for on-demand production of customized items e.g. t-shirts, wall art, mugs, books, hoodies, and cards. We support a new wave of e-commerce entrepreneurs to sell their creativity globally, with a more local and sustainable production. With local production and exact matching of supply and demand, there is no waste, and carbon emissions are reduced.

We own no assets - we build the software that connects world-class production facilities all across the world. We have more than 130 production partners in 32 countries. In 72 hours we can reach more than 5 billion people with customized products in a smarter, faster, and greener way.

Gelato is changing the way that customized products can be produced on-demand. We are already empowering thousands of e-commerce entrepreneurs to grow and scale their businesses. With local production, and exact matching of supply and demand, there is no waste and carbon emissions are reduced.

Gelato consists of three different business units:

Optimalprint - our B2C e-commerce business, offering beautiful high-quality personalized products to consumers all over the world. The products are produced on-demand by Gelato’s local production network.

GelatoCreate - giving creators across the world instant access to a global market of customers. Simple integrations to webshops such as Shopify, Etsy and TikTok allow creators to connect and personalize their designs for a wide range of quality products, and Gelato takes care of the production and fulfillment through our local production.

GelatoConnect - the backbone of Gelato is enterprise software that powers the world's most advanced production on demand facilities, providing unmatched production workflow, logistics and procurement efficiency, quality management and cost savings.




What we are looking for

We are seeking analytics professionals with a passion for business impact to join our world class Finance & Strategy team. As a Data Analyst, you will help build strategic reports for investor and leadership teams and carry out analysis that will inform important financial and strategic decisions for Gelato. You will guide the finance team using data and insights by not simply presenting data, but telling data-driven stories. You will convince and influence your finance and strategy team members using clear insights and recommendations.

The position is based in Gelato’s offices in London (UK), Oslo (Norway), Stockholm (Sweden), and Madrid (Spain)

What you will be doing

Own the design, development, and maintenance of metrics, reports and dashboards to drive key business performance visibility for finance and strategy teams.
Identify trends & patterns using internal and external data sources powered with analytic models to provide actionable insights to business decision-makers.
Generate forecasts, recommendations, and strategic/tactical plans necessary to drive and influence business decision-making.
Share your knowledge and build creative solutions while helping the team evolve best practices.

Who you are

4 years+ of data analytics experience.
Strong attention to detail, ensuring accuracy and integrity in all your analyses
Good time management. You can handle multiple tasks, meeting deadlines without compromising quality.
Collaborative. You work well in a team environment, collaborating effectively with cross-functional teams.
Strong project and stakeholder management skills. You keep all stakeholders informed and manage expectations effectively.
Extensive hands-on experience in SQL.
Experience with data visualization and BI tools like Looker/Tableau/PowerBI.
Good knowledge of statistical analysis.
Excellent communication and presentation skills.

Preferred Qualifications

Experience with finance data or in finance related roles.
Advanced experience with Looker.
Experience in management consulting would be a plus.

What we offer

We offer you a chance to be part of a truly amazing journey in a company that sets very high targets and works hard to achieve them. You will be able to work with smart, motivated, and engaged co-workers from all over the world, in an intense and very energetic environment. This leads to you having a tangible impact on the way that we operate and expand our business.

Some of the highlights of the package include:

Strong technical culture of continuous innovation and improvement
Chance to become a shareholder of Gelato!
Flexible festive holidays, swap days off according to your values and beliefs.
Work at one of our hub city offices or even remotely
And much much more!

What it’s like to work at Gelato

We are a customer-obsessed team with the ambition to change the world by connecting technology to the printing industry and making it much more sustainable. Everyone who joins our team must feel genuinely intrigued and motivated by our mission. We expect a lot. We are a driven team with big goals, so we seek individuals who are genuinely passionate about their work and possess an entrepreneurial spirit. Our culture is unique and we live by our values, so it's worth learning more about our culture and how we work before presenting your application.

At Gelato, we pride ourselves on our global presence with 14 offices worldwide, fostering a dynamic and diverse work environment. Rooted in a culture that values collaboration, creativity, and camaraderie, we actively cultivate a company culture that thrives on shared experiences. We encourage team members to embrace this culture by working from our inspiring office spaces at least three days a week, allowing for meaningful connections and collective growth.

Lastly, we ask that you please upload your CV in English, regardless of which country you are applying from.

Show more
HTML:
About Gelato

Gelato has built the world's largest and most global network for on-demand production of customized items e.g. t-shirts, wall art, mugs, books, hoodies, and cards. We support a new wave of e-commerce entrepreneurs to sell their creativity globally, with a more local and sustainable production. With local production and exact matching of supply and demand, there is no waste, and carbon emissions are reduced.

We own no assets - we build the software that connects world-class production facilities all across the world. We have more than 130 production partners in 32 countries. In 72 hours we can reach more than 5 billion people with customized products in a smarter, faster, and greener way.

Gelato is changing the way that customized products can be produced on-demand. We are already empowering thousands of e-commerce entrepreneurs to grow and scale their businesses. With local production, and exact matching of supply and demand, there is no waste and carbon emissions are reduced.

Gelato consists of three different business units:

Optimalprint - our B2C e-commerce business, offering beautiful high-quality personalized products to consumers all over the world. The products are produced on-demand by Gelato’s local production network.

GelatoCreate - giving creators across the world instant access to a global market of customers. Simple integrations to webshops such as Shopify, Etsy and TikTok allow creators to connect and personalize their designs for a wide range of quality products, and Gelato takes care of the production and fulfillment through our local production.

GelatoConnect - the backbone of Gelato is enterprise software that powers the world's most advanced production on demand facilities, providing unmatched production workflow, logistics and procurement efficiency, quality management and cost savings.


What we are looking for

We are seeking analytics professionals with a passion for business impact to join our world class Finance & Strategy team. As a Data Analyst, you will help build strategic reports for investor and leadership teams and carry out analysis that will inform important financial and strategic decisions for Gelato. You will guide the finance team using data and insights by not simply presenting data, but telling data-driven stories. You will convince and influence your finance and strategy team members using clear insights and recommendations.

The position is based in Gelato’s offices in London (UK), Oslo (Norway), Stockholm (Sweden), and Madrid (Spain)

What you will be doing

  • Own the design, development, and maintenance of metrics, reports and dashboards to drive key business performance visibility for finance and strategy teams.
  • Identify trends & patterns using internal and external data sources powered with analytic models to provide actionable insights to business decision-makers.
  • Generate forecasts, recommendations, and strategic/tactical plans necessary to drive and influence business decision-making.
  • Share your knowledge and build creative solutions while helping the team evolve best practices.

Who you are

  • 4 years+ of data analytics experience.
  • Strong attention to detail, ensuring accuracy and integrity in all your analyses
  • Good time management. You can handle multiple tasks, meeting deadlines without compromising quality.
  • Collaborative. You work well in a team environment, collaborating effectively with cross-functional teams.
  • Strong project and stakeholder management skills. You keep all stakeholders informed and manage expectations effectively.
  • Extensive hands-on experience in SQL.
  • Experience with data visualization and BI tools like Looker/Tableau/PowerBI.
  • Good knowledge of statistical analysis.
  • Excellent communication and presentation skills.

Preferred Qualifications

  • Experience with finance data or in finance related roles.
  • Advanced experience with Looker.
  • Experience in management consulting would be a plus.

What we offer

We offer you a chance to be part of a truly amazing journey in a company that sets very high targets and works hard to achieve them. You will be able to work with smart, motivated, and engaged co-workers from all over the world, in an intense and very energetic environment. This leads to you having a tangible impact on the way that we operate and expand our business.

Some of the highlights of the package include:

  • Strong technical culture of continuous innovation and improvement
  • Chance to become a shareholder of Gelato!
  • Flexible festive holidays, swap days off according to your values and beliefs.
  • Work at one of our hub city offices or even remotely
  • And much much more!

What it’s like to work at Gelato

We are a customer-obsessed team with the ambition to change the world by connecting technology to the printing industry and making it much more sustainable. Everyone who joins our team must feel genuinely intrigued and motivated by our mission. We expect a lot. We are a driven team with big goals, so we seek individuals who are genuinely passionate about their work and possess an entrepreneurial spirit. Our culture is unique and we live by our values, so it's worth learning more about our culture and how we work before presenting your application.

At Gelato, we pride ourselves on our global presence with 14 offices worldwide, fostering a dynamic and diverse work environment. Rooted in a culture that values collaboration, creativity, and camaraderie, we actively cultivate a company culture that thrives on shared experiences. We encourage team members to embrace this culture by working from our inspiring office spaces at least three days a week, allowing for meaningful connections and collective growth.

Lastly, we ask that you please upload your CV in English, regardless of which country you are applying from.

Title: Data Analyst - 100% Remote
Description:
Role Description

We are looking for the very Top Talent…and we would be delighted if you were to join our team!

More in details, UST is a multinational company based in North America, certified as a Top Employer and Great Place to Work company with over 35.000 employees all over the world and presence in more than 35 countries. We are leaders on digital technology services, and we provide large-scale technologic solutions to big companies.

What Are We Looking For

We are looking for Data Analyst who will contribute to a project with one of our global customers.

Your Main Responsibilities Include

Lead data model analysis initiatives, especially in the context of a data migration.

Must be able to investigate and propose data mapping solutions to fulfil target data models.

Key player on conversations with data Quality, data Owners and data Stewards, as well as Subject Matter Experts

Must be able to support test cycles to clarify doubts and resolve incidences.

Progress reporting to senior management

What are we looking for?

4yrs Working Experience As a Data Analyst

Experience in analysis and design of data collection systems.

Track record of developing high quality analysis that has resulted in successful data model definitions and migrations.

Maintains internal and external relationships ensuring compliance in all activities.

Good interpersonal skills and ability to work as a team member.

Good communication and ability to use different influencing styles.

Ability to tailor communication and leadership style to manage or influence colleagues.

Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy.

Strong written and verbal communication skills in English.

What can we offer?


23 days of Annual Leave plus the 24th and 31st of December as discretionary days!
Numerous benefits (Health Care Plan, teleworking compensation, Life and Accident Insurances).
Retribución Flexible´ Program: (Meals, Kinder Garden, Transport, online English lessons, Health Care Plan…)
Free access to several training platforms
Professional stability and career plans
UST also, compensates referrals from which you could benefit when you refer professionals.
The option to pick between 12 or 14 payments along the year.
Real Work Life Balance measures (flexibility, WFH or remote work policy, compacted hours during summertime…)
UST Club Platform discounts and gym Access discounts


If you would like to know more, don’t hesitate to apply and we’ll get in touch to fill you in detail. We are waiting for you!

In UST we are committed to equal opportunities in our selection processes and do not discriminate based on race, gender, disability, age, religion, sexual orientation or nationality.

Skills


Data Analysis
English
100% Remote

Title: Analista de Reporting & BI
Description:
Description et exigences

Nombre de la vacante: Analista de Reporting & BI

Número de posición / avature: 60248626 / 11602

Centro de trabajo: Madrid

¿Te apetece unirte a Endesa?

Estamos en búsqueda de una persona con experiencia en Análisis de data (SQL) y elaboración de reporting para incorporarse como Analista de Reporting & BI para cubrir una vacante en Endesa “Madrid”

¿Quieres ser tú? Te contamos un poco más.

¿Qué se realiza en el área?

Demanda y Precios (DyP) es un área multidisciplinar perteneciente a la línea de negocio de Market que actúa como puente y enlace entre la actividad de comercialización de Electricidad y Gas y la gestión de la energía necesaria para el suministro a nuestra cartera de clientes.

Con foco en las necesidades de Demanda y Precios en España, Portugal y Francia, y asegurando el alineamiento con la Global Information and Communication Technology (ICT), el propósito de la Unidad DyP_Services es mejorar la productividad de los analistas de DyP a través de la optimización y automatización de los procesos; la identificación, definición e implementación de las herramientas de negocio; el gobierno, calidad e inteligencia de los datos, el reporting y el desarrollo de modelos de analítica avanzada; todo ello aportando sinergias, eficiencias y flexibilidad para alcanzar los objetivos de la Tribu de DyP. Realizamos la implementación de estructuras de productos B2C y B2B necesarias para asegurar la formulación, negociación y operación de las ofertas y la reingeniería de los procesos de negocio para posibilitar a DyP el uso del ecosistema de plataformas digitales de Endesa. DyPS es el Focal Point de Demanda y Precios con ICT y Advanced Analytics de Market.

DyP_Services se estructura en cuatro servicios: Processes and Tools, Reporting y BI, Back Office y Modelos. Este puesto forma parte del segundo servicio.

Demanda y Precios es un área que trabaja bajo el esquema de Tribu, promoviendo la liquidez de los recursos entre las distintas funciones, de acuerdo con la priorización continua de las necesidades del negocio. En el contexto actual, este puesto se configura como una posición técnico-funcional vinculada a las funciones de Demand and Prices Services.

¿Y cuáles serán tus funciones?

Principalmente Te Encargarás De

El puesto se encuentra vinculado a las funciones de Demand and Prices Services y participarás en el seguimiento, aseguramiento de calidad e inteligencia de los datos, así como en la elaboración y mantenimiento de informes de reporting vinculados a esta función:


Asegurar el gobierno, calidad e inteligencia de los datos, detectando las necesidades y aplicaciones de uso y mejorando la calidad de los datos que impactan en los Kpi’s de toda la Dirección.
Involucración en los proyectos corporativos que impacten en los repositorios de información relacionados con nuestra Dirección.
Definición, implantación, mantenimiento y mejora del gobierno del Reporting.
Análisis de data y elaboración de reporting agregando la información de las diferentes fuentes existentes.
Diseño y Visualización de Reporting.
Automatización de tareas de reporting.
Apoyo y seguimiento en la gestión de Herramientas Corporativas, tanto nuevas como ya existentes, al resto de áreas de Demanda y Precios.


Te contaremos más detalles durante la entrevista.

¿Para poder realizar este trabajo qué necesitamos de ti?

Principalmente Que Tengas


Grado o licenciatura: Ingeniería Informática, Ingeniería Industrial, Ingeniería Técnico Informático, Matemática, Estadística o Física
Experiencia mínima de 2 años en proyectos donde se maneja gran volumen de información con orígenes diversos y con controles de calidad.
Experiencia mínima de 2 años en elaboración de Reporting
Conocimientos avanzados de SQL y manejo de BBDD (RedShift, Postgre, SQL SERVER, MySQL, Oracle, …)
Conocimientos de Programación (Python, R, .NET, Visual Basic for Applications)
Conocimientos de Business Intelligence y Big Data
Visualización (QlikSense, Qlikview, PowerBI, MicroStrategy, Tableau, etc.)
Gestión de equipos.
Usuario experto Excel
MS Office basics (Word, Excel, Powepoint), MS Office advanced (Access, Project), Outlook, Communication tools (Teams, Yammer)
Project Management, Agile
Idioma: inglés fluido


Además, Valoramos Si Tienes


Conocimiento del sector energético
Idioma: italiano


Y ahora seguro que te interesa saber qué es lo que te vamos a ofrecer

Desde el primer momento contrato indefinido con un modelo de trabajo híbrido, combinando unos días en la oficina y otros fuera de ella y diferentes opciones de flexibilidad horaria para conciliar tu vida y la de tu familia.

Salario alineado a tu perfil y la posición que vas a ocupar. También disfrutarás de una variedad de beneficios sociales; por ejemplo, plan de pensiones, tarifa eléctrica de empleado, ayuda de estudios, ayuda al deporte, préstamos, ayuda económica si tienes hijos con discapacidad, retribución flexible (transporte, formación, seguro médico, guardería, compra de acciones de la empresa, comedor…)

Además, ofrecemos otros servicios como asesoramiento financiero, tarifas especiales con agencia de viajes, condiciones bancarias especiales por ser empleado de Endesa. Dependiendo del centro de trabajo, existe la opción de profesor de pilates, yoga, nutricionista, car sharing, aparcamiento gratuito…

Si crees que esta posición supone una oportunidad de desarrollo y un reto para ti, ¡no lo dudes e inscríbete!

Sólo tienes que aplicar a esta oferta de empleo. Si tu perfil encaja con lo que buscamos, Blanca y Teresa del equipo de Atracción de Talento, valorarán tu candidatura y contactarán contigo, para conocerte más.

Por último, pero no menos importante, para nosotros la diversidad y la inclusión son puntos esenciales en nuestro día a día, por lo que en nuestros procesos de selección siempre contamos con todas las personas que muestran su interés y tienen el perfil que buscamos. Integramos e incluimos la diversidad de personas en todos sus sentidos.

Si quieres conocer un poco más sobre Endesa y Enel, te invitamos a que hagas click en estos enlaces:

Endesa: https://www.endesa.com/es/sobre-endesa/quienes-somos

Enel Green Power: https://www.enelgreenpower.com/es

Endesa X: https://www.endesax.com/es/es

Title: Product Data Analyst
Description:
Lingokids' mission is to help 100 million families worldwide raise amazing kids through playlearning™.




Through play and interactive technology, Lingokids delivers premium, modern learning through educational subjects and life skills so kids can thrive as confident, conscious, resilient, lifelong learners — ready for school and today’s ever-changing world.




Are you ready for Playlearning?™




We’re looking for an exceptional Product Data Analyst to join our team who is passionate about analysing data, identifying trends, and making recommendations to improve our growth strategies. As a key member of our team, you will work closely with Product Managers to improve user experience.




Responsibilities

Analyse user and interaction data to identify patterns, trends, and insights related to product usage and growth.
Collaborate with product managers to develop A/B testing strategies, implement tests, and analyse results to optimise product features and user flows.
Create reports and dashboards that track key performance indicators (KPIs) for product and monetisation.
Provide actionable insights and recommendations to stakeholders based on data analysis to drive product improvements and growth strategy adjustments.
Stay up-to-date with industry trends, tools, and practices related to product led growth and monetisation.
Own analytics projects E2E. Define business problems, translate into data approaches for yourself and more junior members of the team, and deliver insight and tools that will drive change.




Desired experience

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Business, Marketing or a related field.
Proven experience working in a similar role, focusing on product or monetisation and data analysis in a fast growth business.
You have deep expertise in data focussed tools (e.g., SQL, Python) and techniques, and have a history of delivering impactful projects form from start to finish.
Experience with data analytics tools (e.g., Amplitude, Looker) and A/B testing tools and techniques.
Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to present complex data in a clear and persuasive manner.
Self-starter with the ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Creative problem-solving skills and a passion for innovation.
You’re a bright, high calibre candidate who enjoys working in a warm, fast-paced and collaborative environment.




English is a must. We are a multicultural team, and we are providing a service in English so, we don't care about certificates, but we expect you to be able to communicate fluently.




You should feel equally comfortable communicating in long-form writing. We have become a fully remote company so, we believe that being articulate in both spoken and written long-form asynchronous communication is key to working efficiently together.




Experience working closely with non-technical stakeholders to refine requirements and bring them to life is a must.







Life at Lingokids

🏡 Remote working: you can choose to work remotely from within your country or visit our offices if you live in Madrid.

⚖️ Flexible hours and work-life balance: we care about the results you bring to the team. 9 to 6 and constant commuting is not for us either.

📈 Stock options: joining Lingokids means you can choose to own part of the company.

🌍 Visa sponsorship: if you need a visa to work in the EU, Lingokids will assist you during the visa process, costs included.

📚 Professional growth: up to €2.000 per year for conferences, books, and training.

💬 Language lessons: language learning is what we’re all about! We’ll cover language classes for you to learn Spanish, English or Portuguese.

🩺 Health Insurance: we offer an optional health insurance through Adeslas, featuring competitive rates to ensure your well-being.

🧠 Mental Health Support: we offer you 4 free TherapySide sessions to support your self-awareness and well-being

💳 Flexible compensation: you'll be able to include your monthly expenses in meals and transportations into your payroll (we use Cobee).

🍲 Meal allowances: every month, you will receive a 60€ allowance on your Cobee card for you to spend on the restaurants and food delivery services.

🖥 Home office setup: you'll have a 400€ allowance in your first payroll to set up your home office and a 35€ monthly allowance for remote expenses.

🙌 Feedback culture: feedback is the breakfast of champions, and we take it seriously! We have a real-time and honest feedback culture, and a formal 360º assessment every 6 months.




If you think you don't tick all the boxes, we'd still love to hear from you. Nobody checks every box, and we are looking for someone excited to join the team!

HTML:
Lingokids' mission is to help 100 million families worldwide raise amazing kids through playlearning™.


Through play and interactive technology, Lingokids delivers premium, modern learning through educational subjects and life skills so kids can thrive as confident, conscious, resilient, lifelong learners — ready for school and today’s ever-changing world.


Are you ready for Playlearning?™


We’re looking for an exceptional Product Data Analyst to join our team who is passionate about analysing data, identifying trends, and making recommendations to improve our growth strategies. As a key member of our team, you will work closely with Product Managers to improve user experience.


Responsibilities

  • Analyse user and interaction data to identify patterns, trends, and insights related to product usage and growth.
  • Collaborate with product managers to develop A/B testing strategies, implement tests, and analyse results to optimise product features and user flows.
  • Create reports and dashboards that track key performance indicators (KPIs) for product and monetisation.
  • Provide actionable insights and recommendations to stakeholders based on data analysis to drive product improvements and growth strategy adjustments.
  • Stay up-to-date with industry trends, tools, and practices related to product led growth and monetisation.
  • Own analytics projects E2E. Define business problems, translate into data approaches for yourself and more junior members of the team, and deliver insight and tools that will drive change.


Desired experience

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Business, Marketing or a related field.
  • Proven experience working in a similar role, focusing on product or monetisation and data analysis in a fast growth business.
  • You have deep expertise in data focussed tools (e.g., SQL, Python) and techniques, and have a history of delivering impactful projects form from start to finish.
  • Experience with data analytics tools (e.g., Amplitude, Looker) and A/B testing tools and techniques.
  • Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to present complex data in a clear and persuasive manner.
  • Self-starter with the ability to work independently and as part of a team.
  • Creative problem-solving skills and a passion for innovation.
  • You’re a bright, high calibre candidate who enjoys working in a warm, fast-paced and collaborative environment.


English is a must. We are a multicultural team, and we are providing a service in English so, we don't care about certificates, but we expect you to be able to communicate fluently.


You should feel equally comfortable communicating in long-form writing. We have become a fully remote company so, we believe that being articulate in both spoken and written long-form asynchronous communication is key to working efficiently together.


Experience working closely with non-technical stakeholders to refine requirements and bring them to life is a must.



Life at Lingokids

🏡 Remote working: you can choose to work remotely from within your country or visit our offices if you live in Madrid.

⚖️ Flexible hours and work-life balance: we care about the results you bring to the team. 9 to 6 and constant commuting is not for us either.

📈 Stock options: joining Lingokids means you can choose to own part of the company.

🌍 Visa sponsorship: if you need a visa to work in the EU, Lingokids will assist you during the visa process, costs included.

📚 Professional growth: up to €2.000 per year for conferences, books, and training.

💬 Language lessons: language learning is what we’re all about! We’ll cover language classes for you to learn Spanish, English or Portuguese.

🩺 Health Insurance: we offer an optional health insurance through Adeslas, featuring competitive rates to ensure your well-being.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Job Title: Data Analyst

Type: Full-time

Location: Madrid, Paris, or London

What about us?

Welcome to INFINIT, a global tech company supercharging SMEs in select verticals with a unified platform that combines AI-powered business services with banking, operating systems, and deep industry expertise. Our mission is to help businesses grow simply by offering a comprehensive suite of solutions tailored to their unique needs.

At INFINIT, we are transforming vertical banking for SMEs with our advanced technology and industry knowledge, delivering solutions that drive growth and efficiency. We pride ourselves on innovation, transparency, and building strong relationships with our clients.

Join us at INFINIT as we reshape the landscape of business services, making a positive impact on the global economy. Your adventure in fintech starts here!

As a Data Analyst, you will be instrumental in analyzing data to drive strategic decisions and enhance our products and services. You will collaborate closely with operational and engineering teams to optimize operational efficiency and scalability, enabling our solutions to support larger volumes effectively.

What do we want to achieve together?



Structured Projects: Create and execute structured projects that drive growth and success, leveraging data insights to optimize business processes
KPI Management: Excel in defining and managing Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) that provide actionable insights and steer our business strategy
Tools Administration: Administer and optimize tools and systems like CRM and analytics platforms to maximize operational effectiveness
Process Automation: Innovate and streamline processes through automation to improve efficiency and scalability
Strategic Initiatives: Handle strategic tasks that introduce best practices and ensure long-term business success
Data Analysis Mastery: Master the art of data analysis and management to extract valuable insights for decision-making




What do you need to be successful in this role?



Education: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Engineering, Business, or equivalent field
Experience: Up to 4 years of experience in a relevant data-focused role
Language Skills: Fluency in English; proficiency in Spanish is advantageous
Stakeholder Management: Proficient in managing stakeholders to achieve common goals and drive projects forward
Tools Proficiency: Strong proficiency in Excel; familiarity with Power BI, SQL, or willingness to learn
Analytical Mindset: Ability to synthesize data and provide valuable insights to support data-driven decision-making
Adaptability: Capable of maintaining composure in fast-paced environments with tight deadlines
Effective Planning: Strong organizational and planning skills to execute tasks efficiently
Results Orientation: Autonomous and driven by achieving tangible results




What will you find working at Infinit:



Inspiring Mission: We are dedicated to revolutionizing business financing and making a positive impact on the European economy. Your work at Infinit will have a lasting effect on businesses and communities
Diverse and Inclusive Team: Join a dynamic and international team of over 7 nationalities. You'll have the chance to work with experienced professionals from around the world, fostering a rich learning environment
Flexibility and Ownership: we trust our team and we are goal-oriented
Competitive salary and stock options. We offer highly competitive salaries and equity, because we're building this together
Day off on your birthday we celebrate it with you
Flexible Benefits: Access Flexible Retribution benefits through a convenient mobile app
Quality Time Together: We foster a sense of community with annual gatherings and bi-weekly office team gatherings. You're more than welcome to join us for quality time
Health and Well-being: Your health matters to us so we cover you! You will have access to top-quality Medical & Mental Health Insurance
Personal Time Off: Enjoy flexibility with your personal time off




Diversity & Inclusion

Infinit promotes an inclusive culture that seeks equity and values different perspectives. We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer and consider all qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status or any other legally protected characteristic.

Title: Analista BI
Description:
Sobre la Compañía:

Planasa busca de un Analista de Business Intelligence (BI) altamente capacitado y motivado para unirse a nuestro equipo. La ubicación de la posición podra ser en el centro de Madrid, o en el de Valtierra, (Navarra).

El candidato ideal será responsable de extraer, transformar y cargar datos (ETL), así como de desarrollar y mantener informes y dashboards que proporcionen información relevante para la toma de decisiones empresariales.




Responsabilidades:

1.Extracción, transformación y carga de datos (ETL):

Realizar procesos de ETL para integrar datos de diversas fuentes en nuestros sistemas de BI. (Microsoft Fabric)

2.Desarrollo y mantenimiento de informes y dashboards:

Desarrollar y mantener informes y dashboards utilizando herramientas de BI como Tableau, Power BI, Qlikview y Microsoft Fabric.
Garantizar que los informes sean precisos, útiles y presenten la información de manera clara y accesible.

3.Análisis de datos:

Realizar análisis de datos para identificar tendencias, patrones y oportunidades de negocio.
Utilizar herramientas como Excel, Python, R y SSAS para llevar a cabo análisis matemáticos y estadísticos complejos.

4.Resolución de problemas:

Identificar y resolver problemas técnicos relacionados con la infraestructura de datos, informes y dashboards.
Trabajar proactivamente para asegurar la integridad y disponibilidad de los datos.

5.Comunicación efectiva:

Comunicar resultados de análisis y datos complejos de manera clara y efectiva a diferentes audiencias, incluyendo stakeholders no técnicos.
Preparar y presentar informes y presentaciones ejecutivas.

6.Mejora continua:

Mantenerse actualizado con las últimas tendencias y avances en BI.
Proponer e implementar mejoras en los procesos y la eficiencia organizacional.




Requisitos:

Experiencia demostrable en procesos de ETL y manejo de herramientas de BI como Tableau, Power BI, Qlikview y Microsoft Fabric.
Habilidades analíticas y experiencia con herramientas de análisis de datos (Excel, Python, R, SSAS).
Capacidad para resolver problemas técnicos y gestionar proyectos de manera efectiva.
Excelentes habilidades de comunicación para interactuar con diferentes niveles de la organización.
Actitud proactiva hacia la mejora continua y el aprendizaje de nuevas tecnologías y metodologías en BI.




Si eres una persona orientada a los datos con un fuerte enfoque en la mejora continua y la capacidad de traducir datos complejos en información útil, nos encantaría conocerte.

Title: Finance Data Analysis
Description:
About MAXAM

At MAXAM we work to offer our clients throughout the world a wide range of products and services, generating solutions, and full technical support to respond to their most specific needs.

Since our founding in 1872 by Alfred Nobel, MAXAM has grown by leaps and bounds. We are now a global company specializing in energy materials. We apply all our talent, energy and knowledge to the mining and civil engineering sectors, anywhere in the world. A lot has changed since Alfred Nobel started the business but some things haven´t changed: our dedication to our people to achieve excellence in what we do.







What are we looking for?

A Junior Finance or Industrial engineer profile with data analytics skills to join the corporate team in Madrid. This position must perform the following tasks:




- Elaboration and analysis of the key projects monthly financial reporting (Sales/EBITDA, Gross margin, Trade working capital & overdues, etc.).

- Elaboration and monitoring of the projects operational KPI’s.

- Leading with Project Managers the definition and follow up of projects performance improvement plans.

- Elaboration, review and monitoring of projects Business Plans and scenario simulations.

- Modelling of processes and tools to help improve control over formulations.




Minimum requirements:

-Bachelor degree in Business Administration, Economics, Industrial Engineer or similar.

-Excellent oral and written communication skills in English.

-Previous experience in Audit Firm (Big Four) at least 1 year.

- Availability to travel.

- High level in MS Excel

- Experience with ERPs.

- Strong financial and accounting fundamentals.

- Experience in elaboration of Powerpoint presentations and experience in PowerBI is a plus.




Competencies:

Analitical capacity

Initiative

Teamwork

Pressure tolerance

Problem solving

Planning & organization




What we offer?

Permanent contract

Grow within a multinational environment

Flexible compensation package

Title: Business Intelligence
Description:
Desde Grafton Recruitment nos encontramos en la búsqueda de un Business Intelligence, para una importante compañía biofarmacéutica.




¿Qué esperamos de ti?




Identificar y analizar fuentes de datos externas que faciliten un entendimiento de la dinámica del mercado.
Anticipar riesgos & oportunidades y facilitar la toma de decisiones en base a análisis objetivos
Liderar el desarrollo de las capacidades analíticas.
Actualizar y optimizar la Metodología Analítica proporcionando herramientas que permitan realizar un diagnóstico preciso así como un seguimiento de los planes de acción.
Evaluar performance de cada marca a nivel nacional / territorial / cuenta.
Liderar y gestionar la realización de Estudios de Mercado / Competitive Intelligence para cubrir necesidades de información identificadas.
Participación en el proceso de “Insights Generation”
Participar en la elaboración de los Planes Estratégicos & Tácticos de las marcas.
Participar en el proceso de planificación de la estrategia
Liderar la implementación de la metodología “In-Field Team Excellence” en la marca.




¿Cómo te imaginamos?




Capacidad analítica con orientación a negocio
Capacidad de trabajo en equipo
Capacidad de liderazgo e influencia en entornos matriciales
Capacidad de innovación
Licenciatura (Ciencias, Ingenierías, ADE, etc.)
Conocimientos Market Research y Business Insigths
Experiencia previa en posiciones de Business Intelligence en tumores solidos
Nivel alto de Inglés
Zona de trabajo: Madrid
Residencia: Madrid.




Si crees que puedes encajar no dudes en inscribirte ¡Estamos deseando conocerte!

Title: Data Analyst - SAS
Description:
excelia es una firma multinacional de Consultoría, Tecnología y Servicios profesionales con más de 20 años de experiencia. Prestamos servicio en más de 50 países de Europa, América Latina y Estados Unidos desde nuestras 10 oficinas propias.




🕵🏽‍♀️ ¿Qué buscamos?

Estamos en la búsqueda de un perfil Data Analyst con experiencia en SAS, para trabajar estrechamente con uno de nuestros clientes del sector bancario.




📝 Requisitos:

Experiencia profesional de 3 a 5 años.
Alto conocimientos en SAS.
Experiencia en modelos de riesgo.
Disponibilidad para trabajar en modalidad híbrida en Madrid.




Perfil Deseado:

Meticuloso y detallista en el análisis de datos.
Ordenado y estructurado en la gestión de proyectos.
Comprometido con la calidad y precisión en el trabajo




¿Qué ofrecemos?

📝 Contratación estable, para que puedas seguir creciendo junto a nosotros.

💰 Tu banda salarial será acorde a tu experiencia y tu trayectoria profesional.

📖 Creemos en tu desarrollo profesional, por ello te ofrecemos formación continua. Queremos ayudarte a mejorar tus habilidades técnicas.

🏡 Ofrecemos un modelo de trabajo en hibrido para adaptarnos mejor a tus necesidades.

⏰ Jornada intensiva todos los viernes del año, Julio y Agosto.




¡Haz clic en "inscribirme" y forma parte de Excelia, una compañía internacional donde desarrollar todo tu talento!

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Mission

🚀 Join INETUM and be part of our innovative team! 🚀

At INETUM, we are looking for skilled professionals for a challenging project. If you have experience as a DATA ANALYST, and can work remotely from Spain, this is your chance!

What are we looking for?

🎓 Job Responsibilities / Role


Lead data model analysis initiatives, especially in the context of a data migration
Must be able to investigate and propose data mapping solutions to fulfil target data models
Key player on conversations with data Quality, data Owners and data Stewards, as well as Subject Matter Experts
Must be able to support test cycles to clarify doubts and resolve incidences
Progress reporting to senior management



Perfil

📌 Mandatory Skills


3yrs+ working experience as a Data Analyst
Experience in analysis and design of data collection systems
Track record of developing high quality analysis that has resulted in successful data model definitions and migrations.
Maintains internal and external relationships ensuring compliance in all activities.
Good interpersonal skills and ability to work as a team member.
Good communication and ability to use different influencing styles. Ability to tailor communication and leadership style to manage or influence colleagues.
Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy.
Strong written and verbal communication skills in English.



📌 Nice To Have Qualities


Data modelling experience
Knowledge/experience with SQL for Hadoop/Big Data environments
Knowledge/experience with SQL for Postgres/DB2/Relational databases



📌 Qualities


Team player that is energetic, motivated and determined whilst remaining respectful at all times
Pragmatic and results-oriented
Able to execute in an undertermined, uncertain and demanding environment
Able to receive and articulate constructive feedback
Adaptable to diverse set of technical responsibilities
Continuously learn and use their experience to come up with new ideas to solve problems
Commited, responsible, flexible, and resilient when faced with challenges



📌 Experience


4+ years



🎓 Education


University degree in technology, preferably in computer science.



Why INETUM?

We value our collaborators and foster an innovative and collaborative work environment. We offer you the opportunity to work on challenging and high-impact projects, with a team of professionals passionate about technology and continuous development. 💬 If you are ready to take the next step in your career and join a company that values your talent, we want to meet you! 📧 Send your CV and apply today.


¿QUÉ PODEMOS OFRECERTE?:
Retribución salarial acorde con la experiencia aportada
Plan de carrera: ofrecemos una atractiva carrera profesional en función de la experiencia y potencial personal dentro de una compañía en continua evolución y con un sólido crecimiento
Plan de formación en competencias tecnológicas de acuerdo con las exigencias de los proyectos y clientes.
Retribución flexible: te ofrecemos una retribución a la carta pudiendo elegir diferentes productos y modelar tú mismo cómo distribuirlos: seguro de salud, tickets de comida, guardería, tarjeta transporte, etc.
Flexibilidad horaria



Organización

SOBRE INETUM

Somos un consultora digital, internacional y ágil. En la era de la post-transformación digital, nos esforzamos para que cada uno de nuestros 28.000 profesionales pueda renovarse continuamente viviendo positivamente su propio flow digital.

Cada uno de ellos puede diseñar su itinerario profesional de acuerdo a sus preferencias, emprender junto a sus clientes para construir en la práctica un mundo más positivo, innovar en cada uno de los 27 países y conciliar su carrera profesional con su bienestar personal.

Nuestros 28.000 atletas digitales están orgullosos de haberse certificado Top Employer Europe 2024.

Title: Digital Data Analyst
Description:
Estamos buscando un Digital Data Analyst para el equipo Customer Insights para trabajar en el área de Digital en Desigual. La función principal será el desarrollo, análisis, mejora y mantenimiento de dashboards que ayuden en analizar y comprender el negocio.




¿Qué te ofrecemos?




4-day work-week: trabajamos 34 horas dentro de una semana laboral de 4 días para potenciar la creatividad y la conciliación. Además, contamos con flexibilidad horaria de entrada y salida.
Oficinas abiertas al mar: estamos en la Barceloneta frente al Mar Mediterráneo. Las vistas nos inspiran y el entorno nos permite disfrutar de una vida saludable: hacer deporte, llegar en bicicleta o caminando o comer al aire libre.
Podrás flexibilizar tu salario destinándolo a servicios como seguro de salud, transporte, guardería y comida. Además, podrás disfrutar de café, infusiones y fruta fresca cada día.
Desigualiza tu armario: tendrás un 50% de descuento en nuestras colecciones.




Tus funciones principales serán…




Análisis de Métricas Digitales: Recopilar, limpiar y analizar datos de diversas plataformas digitales (Google Analytics, CRM, etc.) para medir el desempeño del negocio y las diferentes campañas.
Optimización del LTV del cliente: Analizar el comportamiento de los usuarios para identificar puntos de fricción y oportunidades de mejora en la experiencia de usuario.
Evaluación de Campañas Digitales: Medir y analizar la efectividad de las campañas de marketing digital (SEM, email marketing, publicidad en redes sociales) y realizar recomendaciones basadas en los datos para optimizar el retorno de inversión (ROI).
Monitoreo y Reportes en Tiempo Real: Configurar y mantener sistemas de monitoreo en tiempo real en Tableau para seguir el rendimiento de las estrategias y generar reportes periódicos para los equipos de digital, proporcionando insights accionables basados en los datos recopilados.
Valorable experiencia con dashboards en Tableau: Crear y mantener dashboards interactivos en Tableau que presenten métricas clave del desempeño (conversiones, tráfico web, engagement) de manera visual y comprensible.




¿Qué buscamos?




Grado en ingeniería, económicas, estadística, matemáticas o similares.
Experiencia con Google Analytics: Conocimiento de Google Analytics para rastrear y analizar métricas de rendimiento del sitio web, comportamiento del usuario y efectividad de las campañas digitales.
Competencia en Microsoft Excel: Sólido conocimiento de Excel, incluyendo el uso de funciones avanzadas, tablas dinámicas y macros para el análisis y presentación de datos.
Habilidades Analíticas y de Resolución de Problemas: Capacidad para interpretar grandes volúmenes de datos, identificar tendencias, detectar problemas y proponer soluciones basadas en los datos.
Conocimientos en Marketing Digital y Comercio Electrónico: Entendimiento de las estrategias y tácticas de marketing digital, así como de las dinámicas del comercio electrónico, para contextualizar y aplicar los insights obtenidos de los datos en iniciativas prácticas y efectivas.
Valorable xperiencia en Herramientas de Análisis de Datos: Dominio de herramientas como Tableau para la creación y mantenimiento de dashboards interactivos. Capacidad para transformar datos complejos en visualizaciones claras y accionables.
Valorable conocimientos Avanzados de SQL: Habilidad para escribir consultas SQL complejas para extraer, manipular y analizar datos de diferentes bases de datos.
Valorable experiencia en optimización de consultas y manejo de grandes volúmenes de datos. Conocimientos de Big Query es un plus.

Title: Analista de Datos
Place: Sant Cugat del Vallès, Catalonia, Spain
Description:
Somos una de las cadenas de alimentación y supermercados más importantes del mundo y creadores del Descuento. Nuestra historia se remonta a 1945, cuando los hermanos Theo y Karl Albrecht se encargaron del negocio de ultramarinos que su familia regentaba desde 1913 en Essen (Alemania). Desde nuestros inicios, siempre hemos tenido en cuenta lo importante que es conocer al cliente y darle lo que necesita al mejor precio. En España abrimos el primer supermercado en 2002 y ya tenemos más de 440 establecimientos




Nos importa el bienestar de las personas: nuestros clientes, nuestro equipo y nuestro entorno. En nuestra compañía, en pleno crecimiento, siempre hay oportunidades laborales para diferentes perfiles profesionales y oportunidades de desarrollo y crecimiento profesional.




Durante estos 100 años, hemos establecido con nuestros clientes una relación de confianza y hemos cubierto sus necesidades diarias. Llevamos el principio de sencillez en nuestro ADN, es nuestra ventaja competitiva y esto nos lleva al éxito como compañía y nos hace sentir orgullosos/as de seguir generando empleo en España. El camino no siempre es fácil, pero cada paso suma. Sabemos que el éxito llega del trabajo en equipo y estamos orgullosos/as de avanzar juntos/as.




Si tienes una mentalidad fuerte, eres tenaz, avanzas con firmeza, cuentas con cualidades para generar una experiencia positiva en las personas que acuden a comprar a nuestras tiendas y quieres alcanzar tus objetivos con un buen equipo... ¡Te invitamos a dar lo mejor de ti y a formar parte de este emocionante camino!




Sencillamente ALDI. Nuestra fuerza son las personas.




Misión del/de la Analista de Datos

Facilitar la toma de decisiones estratégicas y la mejora continua de nuestros procesos a través del análisis riguroso de datos, del desarrollo de herramientas de visualización y de la gestión eficiente de la información. Nuestra misión es convertir los datos en insights accionables que impulsen la eficiencia operativa, la innovación y el crecimiento empresarial, asegurando al mismo tiempo la calidad y la integridad de la información compartida en toda la organización.




Responsabilidades

Analista de datos: Utilizar técnicas estadísticas avanzadas para realizar análisis comparativos entre diferentes muestras de datos, identificar patrones significativos, tendencias, evaluar la correlación entre variables o llevar a cabo tests de impacto para medir el efecto de ciertas variables en los resultados analíticos.
Desarrollo de soluciones: Diseño, desarrollo e implementación de soluciones “end-to-end” para la recopilación, procesamiento y análisis de datos, con foco en la accionabilidad, pero también en la escalabilidad y la facilidad de mantenimiento.
Gestión de proyecto: Gestionar el ciclo completo de vida del proyecto, desde la toma de requerimientos hasta la entrega final, asegurando la calidad y cumplimiento de plazos.
Toma de requerimientos: Colaborar estrechamente con los distintos stakeholders y usuarios para entender las necesidades del negocio y traducirlas en soluciones técnicas efectivas, útiles y fáciles de mantener y escalar.
Optimización del rendimiento: Identificar oportunidades para mejorar el rendimiento de consultas SQL, procesos ETL y modelos analíticos, asegurando la eficiencia operativa del sistema y con foco en la facilidad de comprensión y mantenimiento.
Data governance: Colaborar en la implementación y cumplimiento de políticas y procedimientos de data governance para garantizar la calidad, integridad, seguridad y disponibilidad de los datos en toda la organización.
Data quality: Evaluar la calidad de los datos mediante la identificación y resolución de problemas como duplicados, inconsistencias o valores atípicos, aplicando técnicas y herramientas para mejorar la fiabilidad de los datos.
Mantenimiento y documentación: Documentar los procesos, modelos y decisiones tomadas durante el desarrollo, así como mantener actualizada la documentación técnica para facilitar el mantenimiento futuro.
Seguridad de la información: Asegurar en lo posible que sólo las personas autorizadas tengan acceso a las herramientas e informes compartidos desde Research & Analytics.







Requisitos

Formación Universitaria en Ingeniería, Matemáticas, Estadística, Economía o similar.
Formación complementaria en Análisis de Datos, Minería de Datos, Business Intelligence o áreas afines.
Al menos 2 años de experiencia en el desarrollo “end-to-end” de proyectos de Data & Analytics, desde la toma de requerimientos a la construcción y entrega de la herramienta final.
Experiencia previa en la gestión de proyectos, incluyendo la toma de requerimientos, planificación, seguimiento y comunicación con stakeholders.
Nivel avanzado de SQL y modelos de datos (índices, particiones, claves primarias y foráneas tipos de modelos de datos, normalización, etcétera).
Experiencia en el uso de lenguajes de scripting (R o Python) como ETL (creación de paquetes, refactorización de código, etcétera).
Fuertes habilidades analíticas y capacidad para interpretar datos complejos.
Excelentes habilidades de comunicación y capacidad para trabajar en equipo.
Nivel avanzado de PowerBi (o herramientas similares).
Conocimientos avanzados en técnicas estadísticas y análisis de datos, incluyendo la realización de pruebas de hipótesis y análisis multivariante.




Lo que ALDI ofrece:

📍 Ubicación en nuestras oficinas de Sant Cugat del Vallés.

🌍Posibilidad de formar parte de una multinacional en expansión.

🚀Posibilidades de crecimiento dentro de la empresa.

🏷Descuento en nuestros productos.

💳Plan de retribución flexible.

💻64 días de teletrabajo al año.

🕗Flexibilidad horaria.

📚Formación continua.

👩‍🏫Clases de Idiomas.

✔️ Contrato indefinido.

🙌 Buen ambiente de trabajo.

Show more

Title: Técnico analista de datos
Description:
Descripción de la empresa

Con más de 150 años de trayectoria en Agbar seguimos anticipándonos y adaptándonos para dar respuesta a las necesidades de nuestro entorno, con el objetivo de mejorar la calidad de vida de las personas. Con la fuerza de las alianzas impulsamos soluciones innovadoras para la gestión sostenible del agua y el medio ambiente, en línea con los Objetivos de Desarrollo Sostenible de Naciones Unidas.

, Descripción del empleo

Entrarás a formar parte de un departamento junto 4 personas donde nos encargamos de más de 40 informes Power BI que dan servicio a más de 800 usuarios.Estamos en constante crecimiento, tanto en número de usuarios como informes, así como de la cantidad de datos que gestionamos y analizamos.

Es por ello que buscamos un apasionado de los datos y el análisis que sea capaz de crear modelos de estrella y galaxias de datos eficientes, y mostrar la información de la forma más clara posible. Participaras en informes relacionados con el ámbito técnico, clientes, económico, financiero, etc...

Palabras como KPI, Gateways, INNER, CALCULATE, SWITCH, serán habituales.

, Requisitos

Buscamos un/a : ingeniero, ingeniero matemático, matemático y experto en data science.

Descripción de la empresa

Con más de 150 años de trayectoria en Agbar seguimos anticipándonos y adaptándonos para dar respuesta a las necesidades de nuestro entorno, con el objetivo de mejorar la calidad de vida de las personas. Con la fuerza de las alianzas impulsamos soluciones innovadoras para la gestión sostenible del agua y el medio ambiente, en línea con los Objetivos de Desarrollo Sostenible de Naciones Unidas.

, Descripción del empleo

Entrarás a formar parte de un departamento junto 4 personas donde nos encargamos de más de 40 informes Power BI que dan servicio a más de 800 usuarios.Estamos en constante crecimiento, tanto en número de usuarios como informes, así como de la cantidad de datos que gestionamos y analizamos.

Es por ello que buscamos un apasionado de los datos y el análisis que sea capaz de crear modelos de estrella y galaxias de datos eficientes, y mostrar la información de la forma más clara posible. Participaras en informes relacionados con el ámbito técnico, clientes, económico, financiero, etc...

Palabras como KPI, Gateways, INNER, CALCULATE, SWITCH, serán habituales.

, Requisitos

Title: Junior Data Analyst - FTC
Description:
Description

**Please note this is a 6 month Fixed Term Contract, starting ASAP **

Do you want to learn how the most complex transportation network is managed on a daily basis?

Our entire business is focused on delighting our customers. We strive to stay agile from the second an order is placed online and throughout the seamless coordination of that order behind the scenes. That can be described in one of our core Leadership Principles, which is Bias for Action. This means that our teams band together and aren’t content with just with the status quo. We’re aiming to become the most customer-centric company on Earth.

As a Logistics Scheduler you will have the opportunity to create world-class customer experiences leveraging your innovation, team player and problem solving skills.

This role covers 24/7 shifts that include fixed weekend days.

Key job responsibilities


Execute daily same day or next day forecasts.
Plan delivery routes or monitor the volume flow, affecting tens of thousands of packages at EU level.
You will be accountable for planning accuracy, cost and customer experience. In addition, you will be instrumental in developing best practices and standard work for the network.
Ensure targets and service deadlines are met, according to regulatory requirements.
Communicate with various departments, facilitating the flow of information between different stakeholders and resolving any potential issues that impact business continuity.
Conduct research into process improvement initiatives and taking real-time decisions by taking a step back at strategic intervals to take in the bigger picture.
Maintain and report up to date and accurate statistics, management reports and analysis.


A day in the life

This position is office-based 3 days per week, with the flexibility to work remotely up to two days per week in line with Amazon’s current flexible work guidance. Amazon encourages open communication about unique needs for flexible arrangements.

As a Logistics Scheduler you will work across the EU in a cross-functional environment with the Supply Chain, Distribution Centers, and Ground Transportation teams, in order to support our day-to-day operations to ensure the timely delivery of Heavy/Bulky shipments to our customers.

Basic Qualifications


Relevant experience in an analytical tasks or projects, working with data
Advanced proficiency in verbal and written English (C1 in the Common European Framework of Reference, CEFR)
Relevant experience working with the MS Office suite (Word, Excel, Outlook)


Preferred Qualifications


Preferred qualifications are not required to apply for a position at Amazon. If you have all the basic qualifications above, we’d love to hear from you.
Relevant experience in communicating with senior stakeholders and leadership
Previous experience within transportation or logistics
Working experience on programming and coding languages (SQL or Python).
Flexibility to work night shift if requested


Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.


Company - Amazon Road Transport Spain, S.L.U.
