Se requiere:

  • Titulación universitaria en ingeniería, matemáticas, estadística o similar, ADE.
  • Experiencia previa de 5-8 años en:
  • Estudios de mercados
  • Inteligencia competitiva
  • Análisis de datos para mercadeo.
  • Nivel de EXCEL Alto
  • Inglés alto
  • Ideal: alimentación o consumo masivo o similares
  • Valorable experiencias en: Kantar, Nielsen, Ipsos, GfK, Euromonitor, IRI/Circana, Empresa de Consumo Masivo en la función descrita y no en desarrollo de negocio.


Se ofrece:

  • Contratación INDEFINIDA por parte de la empresa.
  • Zona de trabajo: Corredor del Henares
  • Horario: flexibilidad entrada/salida y Viernes Intensiva de mañana.
  • Salario fijo+ variable.
  • Teletrabajo( 1 día/sem).

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
At EA, we thrive on outrageous thinking. It’s the fuel that inspires the best games in the world. We’re innovators and great storytellers. But it’s not just about amazing your peers, it’s about amazing yourself. Take risks. Collaborate with great minds and dare to dream big. Do you want to come with us? Together, we are changing the way millions play every day.

EA inspires the world to play, and the Worldwide Localization Team makes that happen! We are accountable for delivering the high-quality localized versions of our titles to over 30 countries around the world. You will find a vibrant, multicultural environment with a great mixture of professionals. From software engineers, project managers, testers to audio, text and linguistic specialists, each employee has an important role to play. EA has built a cutting-edge Localization powerhouse that covers the needs for both current and next-generation platform

Are you a dedicated and experienced Data Analyst looking for an exciting opportunity to join a dynamic team? We are seeking a talented individual to become a key player in our Loc Data & AI team at Electronic Arts (EA). This role is pivotal to our data-driven decision-making process, where you will analyze data to uncover insights that enhance our gaming.

Responsibilities


Data Analysis: Analyze complex data sets to identify trends, patterns, and correlations.
Visualization: Create compelling data visualizations and reports that effectively communicate findings to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Usability: Design and develop user-friendly dashboards, reports, and tools to facilitate data-driven decision-making.
Storytelling: Craft compelling narratives to convey complex data insights and recommendations to various audiences.
Ownership: Deliver end-to-end data projects, from initial data requirements gathering and validation to final analysis and presentation.
Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams to integrate data insights into business strategies.
Data Quality: Ensure data accuracy, integrity, and compliance with organizational standards.
Tool Development: Develop and maintain tools, scripts, and documentation to support data analysis and visualization.


Qualifications And Skills


Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field with relevant experience or a Master’s degree.
A minimum of 5 years of experience in providing valuable insights that have demonstrably enhanced outcomes.
Excellent level of English.
Technical Proficiency:
Microsoft Power BI: Expertise in Power Query M, DAX, dataset modeling, reports, and dashboards design, with the ability to design prototypes to support requirements.
APIs: Understanding of REST APIs and SOAP APIs, with the ability to read and understand technical specifications.
Data Analysis and SQL: Strong expertise in data analysis and SQL programming.
UX/UI Design: Sound knowledge of UX/UI design for analytics solutions.
Version Control and CI/CD: Proficiency with Git and CI/CD (multi-branch approach).
Soft Skills:
Teamwork: Strong team worker with a delivery-focused mindset.
Agile Experience: Experience working within Agile teams.
Stakeholder Communication: Ability to articulate conversations with business stakeholders beyond the technical level discussion of the user stories.
Communication: Robust communication skills, with the ability to explain complex concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Strategic Thinking: Strong strategic and problem-solving skills, with the ability to anticipate potential issues and create effective solutions.
Exceptional ability in data visualization and design, with a focus on crafting compelling data narratives.
Mastery in leveraging Business Intelligence tools to drive data analysis and strategic decision-making.


Connect your future to ours. Inspire. Dream. Play

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Who We Are

At CoverWallet we are determined to revolutionize the insurance industry! We launched in 2015 and since then we are the leading digital platform for contracting insurance for small and medium-sized companies. Thanks to state-of-the-art technology and meticulous design we have turned insurance management and processing into a simple, fast and convenient process for our clients. All online, in minutes!

Our passion is in delivering innovation and value creation through technology, and our mission is to become the world’s leading InsurTech. For this, we have built an incredible team of ~800 people based in New York, Spain, Poland and Singapore. Success is guaranteed as we are an Aon company, the global leaders in risk, retirement and health solutions with 50,000 colleagues worldwide. We combine the mentality and culture of a high-growth startup with the backing and support of a global multinational. The best of both worlds in one company - what could we ask more?

About The Role

As a Data Analyst, you will be responsible for building robust analytical platforms to support data-driven initiatives across the company. In this role, you will deliver strategic analysis on high priority initiatives across the entire organization. You will be working closely with Product, Marketing, Sales, and Operations in providing them with awareness of real-time data. You will be expected to deliver data-driven insights that will play an integral role in defining the company’s data model.

A typical day


Use Looker to build critical dashboards that will measure business performance, hold teams accountable, and generate insights.
Democratize data through strategic data structuring by developing Looker explores to support our internal collaborators.
Own data analysis and visualization, and communicate the outcomes/insights to various collaborators that will be utilized to make strategic decisions for improvements.
Partner with the Analytics and Data Engineering teams to understand current problems with our existing data platform, identity solutions, and deliver high quality data foundations to data stakeholders across multiple business lines.
Work cross-functionally with Product, Sales, Operations, and Marketing to provide them with visibility to real-time data on existing and new processes.


What You Need To Succeed


About 2 - 4 years of experience in a data analyst role.
Bachelor’s Degree in a quantitative field.
Highly proficient in SQL
Experience using visualization tools, preferably Looker, Tableau, or Power BI.
Experience working in Agile environments, preferably with Jira.
Extra Credit - Exposure to data modeling and transformation tools like dbt and experience with data analysis and building data pipelines with Python.
Strong written and verbal communication skills.
Problem solver with excellent analytical skills.
Hability to work in a fast-paced environment.
Comfortable working on multiple projects simultaneously.
Strong quantitative reasoning skills and experience using data to provide insights to executive leadership and other departments.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
About us




We are a multinational food company that conserves the goodness of nature in our products. We carefully select our fruit and vegetables from their origin, maintaining the highest quality and safety throughout the production process.




We pride ourselves in providing consumers with natural, healthy, and nutritious products that have made us a reference in infant and adult nutrition. In addition, the Hero Institute of Infant Nutrition is within the Hero Spain facilities.




Website: www.hero.es




Sector: Food company




Company size: More than 4,000 employees




Headquarters: Lenzburg, Switzerland




Company type: Private company




Categories: Baby food, Healthy Snacks, Natural Spreads, Sauces, Juices and Nectars, Cereal Snacks, Prepared meals




What is our commitment?




We are on a mission to delight consumers by conserving the goodness of nature. The world today is different from what it was 10 years ago, and nothing like it was in 1886 when Hero was founded in Lenzburg, Switzerland. However, our core goals remain the same. We have adapted to change, offering consumers high quality, healthy, natural and sustainable food.




Hero Spain, with its headquarter in Alcantarilla (Murcia), has formed part of this legacy since 1922. We are committed to naturalness in our products, maintaining a firm nutritional commitment and constantly improving thanks to our commitment to continuous innovation and research, to adapt to the needs of consumers, customers, and new market trends.




Team value proposition




Recently, Hero Spain has been certified as a #TopEmployer in 2023 and 2024 🏆, an achievement that reflects our ongoing commitment to the well-being and development of our team of talents. This recognition is a testament to the exceptional culture we have cultivated together, positioning us as one of the best companies to work for in Spain. This would not have been possible without the commitment and dedication of every person who is part of the Hero family.




We don't hire top talent so we can tell them what to do. That doesn't make sense. At Hero, we give you the opportunity to make your mark and contribute to something bigger. We’ll give you the tools and skills to do your job and then get out of the way.




Purpose




We are on a mission to conserve what's good in nature. We do so by striving to conduct our business sustainably and striving to do the right thing. Always. Without compromises.




Values

The new values reflect the company today and the company we want to build in the future. Values are at the heart of who we are as people and they guide how we behave.




Create wow

We dare to do things differently, seek to always win with consumers and customers, and endeavor to be forever relevant and vital to our world. It’s about Curiosity, Innovation and Consumer/Customer Focus.

Everyone Hero

We work together in pursuit of our common mission and strategy, strengthening our local businesses by leveraging the power of the collective. It’s about Purpose, Performance and Teamwork.

Nourish others

We treat everyone with honesty, care and respect and provide our people, customers and consumers with what they need to thrive. It’s about Honesty, Empowerment, Respect and Diversity.

Take responsibility

We make good choices today to build a more sustainable business and environment fit for the needs of tomorrow. It’s about Sustainability, Ownership, Heritage and Quality.




Impact




We value good ideas, so we want the best talent. Our people can make a difference because we give them the freedom to act, to be entrepreneurial, and to make a difference. This is reflected in the responsibilities. Be yourself, be impactful.




Growth




We all win if we grow together. It's about professional and personal growth. The best way to grow as a company is to help you grow as a person, hence the availability of learning and development opportunities.




Meet you future department




The Finance department owns the financial close process and produces financial statements and reports to guide strategic decision-making.




How can you help us?




As a Data Analyst, you will be responsible for analyzing large datasets to extract valuable insights and generate ideas that drive strategic decision-making within the company. Your ability to understand and use Business Intelligence tools, as well as your experience in the SAP environment, will be essential for success in this role.




Your main responsibilities




Gather and analyze data from multiple sources, including internal databases, SAP systems, and other relevant data sources.
Develop and maintain BI reports and dashboards to provide actionable insights to different departments.
Identify trends, patterns, and opportunities for improvement through data analysis.
Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams to understand the requirements of different areas and translate them into data analysis solutions.
Maintain and optimize existing BI systems, ensuring data integrity and accuracy.
Provide training and support to end users in the use of BI tools and SAP systems.
Participate in continuous improvement projects to drive efficiency and effectiveness of data analysis within the organization.




Academic Background




Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, or a related field.
Proficiency in Spanish and B2-C1 level of English.
Experience working with SAP systems (preferably SAP HANA) and in Master Data analysis and control.
Proven experience in data analysis, preferably in a business environment.
Proficiency in Business Intelligence tools, with particular value placed on Power BI.
Advanced knowledge of Microsoft Excel and Power Platform, Databases, DAX.




Skills and competences




Strong analytical skills and ability to translate data into meaningful information, as well as representing it in graphical and visual reports.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a team.
Results-oriented and able to manage multiple tasks simultaneously.




Others




Based in Spain




What do we offer you?




(Confidentiality is assured)

During these 100 years we have come a long way, but we want to continue doing so for another 100 years. To do so, we need talented, curious, innovative, collaborative, diverse and responsible people to be part of this great team.




Benefits

Hybrid work
Flexible Schedule and early finish on Fridays, also during summer months
Attractive Compensation & Benefits package
Physiotherapist
Continuous learning and development
Ongoing feedback
Collaborative and challenging multinational environment
Strong values
Matrix organization
Open and transparent culture
Great work environment
Amazing people
and much more!




Would you like to join us?




If you what to know more about Hero, access our web site: www.hero.es

If you want to dive into our commitment to sustainability, access our 2023 Annual Report.

Your ability to understand and use Business Intelligence tools, as well as your experience in the SAP environment, will be essential for success in this role.


Your main responsibilities


  • Gather and analyze data from multiple sources, including internal databases, SAP systems, and other relevant data sources.
  • Develop and maintain BI reports and dashboards to provide actionable insights to different departments.
  • Identify trends, patterns, and opportunities for improvement through data analysis.
  • Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams to understand the requirements of different areas and translate them into data analysis solutions.
  • Maintain and optimize existing BI systems, ensuring data integrity and accuracy.
  • Provide training and support to end users in the use of BI tools and SAP systems.
  • Participate in continuous improvement projects to drive efficiency and effectiveness of data analysis within the organization.


Academic Background


  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, or a related field.
  • Proficiency in Spanish and B2-C1 level of English.
  • Experience working with SAP systems (preferably SAP HANA) and in Master Data analysis and control.
  • Proven experience in data analysis, preferably in a business environment.
  • Proficiency in Business Intelligence tools, with particular value placed on Power BI.
  • Advanced knowledge of Microsoft Excel and Power Platform, Databases, DAX.


Skills and competences


  • Strong analytical skills and ability to translate data into meaningful information, as well as representing it in graphical and visual reports.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
  • Ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a team.

(Confidentiality is assured)

During these 100 years we have come a long way, but we want to continue doing so for another 100 years. To do so, we need talented, curious, innovative, collaborative, diverse and responsible people to be part of this great team.


Benefits

  • Hybrid work
  • Flexible Schedule and early finish on Fridays, also during summer months
  • Attractive Compensation & Benefits package
  • Physiotherapist

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Who we are

Quantion is a Business Digital Transformation services company born in 2015.




We have +120 professionals in application development, UX/UI and digital business transformation to build innovative solutions oriented to business results.




As a Digital Factory we combine our teams in cutting-edge technologies and digital deep experiences with the innovation ecosystem, to ensure that we can provide the best solution to face business challenges, from its concept to its implementation.




We are looking for a Data Analyst to join our Technology team. If you want to participate in one of our biggest International projects, don’t hesitate to apply!




What you will do:

You will be responsible for designing, developing and maintaining data collection architecture, reports, metrics and analyses for different teams
You will juggling all kinds of data, collect and analyze them and seek for patterns and trends to drive the digital acceleration and future customer experience
You will utilize big data and business intelligence technologies to shape and drive key business decisions.
You'll make analysis results accessible by building and providing dashboards and reports based on business needs
You closely align with business and management teams to assess business needs
You collaborate with the product teams to identify possibilities for improvement and adaptations regarding their digital products
You will work pragmatically and support my team to deliver high quality solutions with speed
You will work in an international environment with a diverse team
You will work in an international environment with a highly diverse team




Required skills:

At least 2 years of experience as a Digital Analyst
Experience in working in cross-functional teams in an agile environment
Knowledge of software-development processes, dependencies and digital products as well as methodologies and frameworks like Scrum and Kanban
Knowledge of databases (e.g., SQL, NoSQL…), reporting tools (e.g. , Tableau) and cloud platforms (esp. Microsoft Azure)
Ambition to master and not being intimidated by unstructured data and large datasets
Willingness to expand my comfort zone by sometimes leaving it
Very good command of English language







Apply to our offer…

💟 If you are passionate about technologies

💟 If you define yourself as a team worker

💟 If you want to work with a multidisciplinary and international team

💟 If you want to be part of a company which is permanently expanding and growing

💟 If you want to work in an international environment




Our offering:

✨ Permanent contract

✨ Competitive salary

✨ 22 days of vacation

✨ 5 additional holidays for Christmas

✨ 4 additional holidays for Easter

✨ Flexible working time

✨ Continuous working days in summer




Committed to equality, at Quantion we believe in diversity and inclusion. We defend equal opportunities without discriminating based on gender, age, religion or sexual orientation or any other aspect that could be considered exclusive.

Title: Analista de datos
Description:
¡En K-LAGAN te estamos esperando para continuar creciendo juntos!




¿Quiénes somos?




K-LAGAN es una empresa internacional de servicios tecnológicos que se destaca por su compromiso con su equipo y la sociedad. Especializada en servicios IT, desarrollos de ingeniería, electrónica y proyectos de I+D, estamos buscando un/una Ingeniero de Datos con experiencia confirmada para unirse a nuestro equipo en el Departamento de Soluciones de Monitorización.




En esta posición tendrás las siguientes responsabilidades:




Construirás pipelines de datos utilizando PySpark.
Desarrollarás cubos tabulares con Analysis Services (DAX).
Crearás cuadros de mando utilizando Power BI.
Evaluarás necesidades para establecer una lista de requisitos funcionales y técnicos.
Trabajarás con equipos de terceros (equipo de integración de datos y equipo de Datalake).
Implementarás la ingesta y transformación de datos.




Lo que necesitas para destacarte en esta posición:




Experiencia de 4 a 7 años en las tecnologías y responsabilidades mencionadas.
Dominio de PySpark, Analysis Services (DAX), Power BI, Azure Datalake, Databricks, Azure Analysis Services y Azure DevOps.
Capacidad para diseñar soluciones técnicas que cubran las necesidades (Modelo de datos, Flujo de integración, Mapeo de datos).
Habilidades para trabajar de manera autónoma, siendo proactivo y dinámico.
Nivel de inglés alto ya que vas a trabajar con un equipo multicultural.




Al vincularte con K-LAGAN, estos serán tus beneficios:




Tendrás un contrato indefinido, mutua y proyecto estable.
Team building: barbacoas, cafés tecnológicos y encuentros para que estemos más cerca.
Seguimiento continuo: contarás con reuniones con nuestros BM para que sigas creciendo y puedas tener feedback sobre tu desempeño.
Acceso a formación adicional en tech skills, soft skills e idiomas.
Eventos especiales: cena de verano, cena de navidad y día solidario.
El día de tu cumpleaños será libre: ¡disfrútalo cómo, dónde y con quien quieras!




Los pasos de nuestro proceso de selección son:

Primera entrevista ; Entrevista Técnica ; Entrevista Final.




📍 Ubicación: Campo de las naciones (Madrid). Modalidad híbrida 2 días en oficina.




Si te apasiona la tecnología y tienes experiencia confirmada en el área, ¡te invitamos a unirte a nuestro equipo y crecer juntos en K-LAGAN! Aplica ahora.

¡En K-LAGAN te estamos esperando para continuar creciendo juntos!


¿Quiénes somos?


K-LAGAN es una empresa internacional de servicios tecnológicos que se destaca por su compromiso con su equipo y la sociedad. Especializada en servicios IT, desarrollos de ingeniería, electrónica y proyectos de I+D, estamos buscando un/una Ingeniero de Datos con experiencia confirmada para unirse a nuestro equipo en el Departamento de Soluciones de Monitorización.


En esta posición tendrás las siguientes responsabilidades:


  • Construirás pipelines de datos utilizando PySpark.
  • Desarrollarás cubos tabulares con Analysis Services (DAX).
  • Crearás cuadros de mando utilizando Power BI.
  • Evaluarás necesidades para establecer una lista de requisitos funcionales y técnicos.
  • Trabajarás con equipos de terceros (equipo de integración de datos y equipo de Datalake).
  • Implementarás la ingesta y transformación de datos.


Lo que necesitas para destacarte en esta posición:


  • Experiencia de 4 a 7 años en las tecnologías y responsabilidades mencionadas.
  • Dominio de PySpark, Analysis Services (DAX), Power BI, Azure Datalake, Databricks, Azure Analysis Services y Azure DevOps.
  • Capacidad para diseñar soluciones técnicas que cubran las necesidades (Modelo de datos, Flujo de integración, Mapeo de datos).

  • Seguimiento continuo: contarás con reuniones con nuestros BM para que sigas creciendo y puedas tener feedback sobre tu desempeño.
  • Acceso a formación adicional en tech skills, soft skills e idiomas.
  • Eventos especiales: cena de verano, cena de navidad y día solidario.
  • El día de tu cumpleaños será libre: ¡disfrútalo cómo, dónde y con quien quieras!


Los pasos de nuestro proceso de selección son:

Primera entrevista ; Entrevista Técnica ; Entrevista Final.

Title: Data Analyst - SQL y PySpark
Description:
excelia es una firma multinacional de Consultoría, Tecnología y Servicios profesionales con más de 20 años de experiencia. Prestamos servicio en más de 50 países de Europa, América Latina y Estados Unidos desde nuestras 10 oficinas propias.




🕵🏽‍♀️ ¿Qué buscamos?

Estamos buscando un perfil de Data Analyst - SQL y PySpark, tu papel será esencial en la migración de consultas de datos al nuevo entorno, lo que contribuirá al éxito continuo de los productos financieros de nuestro cliente, líder en el sector bancario.




📝 Requisitos:

Experiencia entre 2 y 4 años en SQL y PySpark.
Capacidad para comprender y traducir las necesidades comerciales en consultas y análisis de datos efectivos.
Conocimiento de herramientas de visualización de datos como Tableau o Power BI (deseable).
Habilidad para trabajar de manera efectiva en equipo comunicarte claramente con diferentes departamentos.
Fuertes habilidades analíticas y atención al detalle.
Experiencia previa en proyectos de migración de datos (será un plus).







¿Qué ofrecemos?

📝 Contratación estable, para que puedas seguir creciendo junto a nosotros.

💰 Tu banda salarial será acorde a tu experiencia y tu trayectoria profesional.

😱 Además podrás beneficiarte a través de nuestro paquete de retribución flexible.

📖 Creemos en tu desarrollo profesional, por ello te ofrecemos formación continua.







¡Haz clic en "inscribirme" y forma parte de Excelia, una compañía internacional donde desarrollar todo tu talento!

Title: Analista de datos
Description:
Desde Ona estamos buscando a un/a Analista de Datos para nuestro departamento de Tecnología e Innovación.




¡Estamos en plena expansión y crecimiento!




¿Qué nos diferencia? ¿Qué podemos ofrecerte?




Ona está creciendo muchísimo, es un momento muy bueno para entrar a formar parte de nosotros/as, crecer y construir juntos.
Contrato indefinido e incorporación inmediata.
Oportunidad de desarrollo y promoción interna.
Salario de incorporación: 25.000€ - 30.000 € (según experiencia)
Beneficios sociales: Retribución flexible Cobee, Adeslas a precio reducido, descuentos en nuestros complejos, RCI, descuentos en la plataforma ShoppyClub entre otros.
Diferentes actividad a lo largo del año: Afterworks, evento de Navidad, etc...
Flexibilidad horaria, entrada entre 8:30 y 9:30; salida a partir de las 17:30. Viernes intensivos.




Serás una pieza fundamental y clave para este departamento, y para Ona.




¿Cuáles serán tus funciones principales?




- Diseño y mantenimiento de bases de datos (SQL Server y Azure SQL, SSAS).

- Gestión de proyectos de diseño y despliegue de sistemas de información.

- Capacidad para traducir requisitos de negocio en soluciones técnicas.

- Experiencia en la creación de dashboards y reportes interactivos.







¿Qué necesitamos de ti?




- Estudios universitarios en campos tecnológicos y TI, o Grado Medio con experiencia en el sector.

- Experiencia comprobable en desarrollo de informes.

- Conocimientos avanzados en Power BI y SQL.

- Excelente capacidad de comunicación y presentación de informes a stakeholders.

- Trabajo en equipo y colaboración con diferentes departamentos.

- Adaptabilidad y aprendizaje continuo para mantenerse al día con las últimas tendencias tecnológicas.




Serán altamente valorados:

-Conocimientos comprobables con herramientas del entorno Microsoft Fabric / Microsoft Power Platform.

-Certificaciones en Power BI y/o SQL.

-Transact SQL o KQL.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
🚀 Join INETUM and be part of our innovative team! 🚀




At INETUM, we are looking for skilled professionals for a challenging project. If you have experience as a DATA ANALYST, and can work remotely from Spain, this is your chance!







What are we looking for?

🎓 Job Responsibilities / Role:

Lead data model analysis initiatives, especially in the context of a data migration
Must be able to investigate and propose data mapping solutions to fulfil target data models
Key player on conversations with data Quality, data Owners and data Stewards, as well as Subject Matter Experts
Must be able to support test cycles to clarify doubts and resolve incidences
Progress reporting to senior management







📌 Mandatory Skills:

3yrs+ working experience as a Data Analyst
Experience in analysis and design of data collection systems
Track record of developing high quality analysis that has resulted in successful data model definitions and migrations.
Maintains internal and external relationships ensuring compliance in all activities.
Good interpersonal skills and ability to work as a team member.
Good communication and ability to use different influencing styles. Ability to tailor communication and leadership style to manage or influence colleagues.
Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy.
Strong written and verbal communication skills in English.







📌 Nice to have qualities:

Data modelling experience
Knowledge/experience with SQL for Hadoop/Big Data environments
Knowledge/experience with SQL for Postgres/DB2/Relational databases




📌 Qualities:

Team player that is energetic, motivated and determined whilst remaining respectful at all times
Pragmatic and results-oriented
Able to execute in an undertermined, uncertain and demanding environment
Able to receive and articulate constructive feedback
Adaptable to diverse set of technical responsibilities
Continuously learn and use their experience to come up with new ideas to solve problems
Commited, responsible, flexible, and resilient when faced with challenges




📌 Experience:

4+ years




🎓 Education:

University degree in technology, preferably in computer science.




Why INETUM?

We value our collaborators and foster an innovative and collaborative work environment. We offer you the opportunity to work on challenging and high-impact projects, with a team of professionals passionate about technology and continuous development. 💬 If you are ready to take the next step in your career and join a company that values your talent, we want to meet you! 📧 Send your CV and apply today.

Title: Analista de Datos & Sistemas
Description:
Estamos en búsqueda de un Data Analyst con ganas de superarse día a día para uno de nuestros clientes finales más importantes del sector de energías.




RESPONSABILIDADES:




Administrar y dar soporte con herramientas de consolidación e informes utilizadas en finanzas entorno PowerBI para su correcto diseño, construcción y mantenimiento.
Analizar los flujos de datos en toda la organización e identificar oportunidades de mejora, al tiempo que brindar soporte a las líneas de negocio para garantizar que el sistema satisfaga sus necesidades comerciales.
Contribuir con habilidades técnicas (SQL, Azure ADF, Python, RPA) a las iniciativas de automatización.
Brindar soporte a FP&A, Control y otros líderes funcionales con informes y análisis ad hoc.




HABILIDADES:




Graduado en Ingeniería, Matemáticas y Estadística + Máster relacionado en Data.
+2 años de experiencia trabajando como consultor implementando herramientas de informes o como administrador del sistema de informes.
Conocimientos avanzados en PowerBI.
Ser una persona analítica, con habilidades sólidas para resolver problemas y analizar errores, orientado a resultados y con un enfoque estructurado en el trabajo.
Capacidad para trabajar en equipo y asumir un rol de gestión práctico.
Curiosidad intelectual, alta motivación y deseo de mejora continua.
Inglés: mínimo un C1.




CONDICIONES:




Banda salarial: 35.000 - 40.000€
Beneficios flexibles: seguro de vida, seguro de salud y tickets restuarantes.
Modelo de trabajo: Híbrido, 1 día de teletrabajo.




¡Si te ha interesado y estás en ese punto que quieres hacer un cambio en tu trayectoría profesional este es tu momento, así que no lo dudes y aplica!

Title: Data Visualization Analyst (Multinacional)
Description:
En VISEO nos diferenciamos por la participación en proyectos innovadores de soluciones Cloud, usando tecnologías Microsoft, líderes en el mercado y donde actualmente somos Partners y aportamos más de 490 certificaciones.

Esta es una gran oportunidad para formar parte de una multinacional presente en los 5 continentes como Data Visualization Analyst.

Tu Rol:


Generación de visualización e interpretación de datos (diseño de sistemas, tableros, gráficos de información, mapeo, herramientas de datos) dando sentido al flujo de análisis y storytelling que ayude a las áreas de negocio.
Liderar junto con el Product Owner las relaciones con los equipos de negocio (comerciales y/o de operaciones), para asegurar un pleno entendimiento del área.
Apoyar a su equipo en la resolución de problemas y desafíos relacionados con reportería y análisis de la información.


Tu perfil:


Profesional con 3 años de experiencia laboral previa como analista de datos utilizando herramientas de visualización como Tableau, Power BI o similares.
Formación superior en negocios, matemáticas, económicas, finanzas, estadística o ingeniería.
Se valora experiencia en sector aéreo, turismo y viajes.
Buena capacidad de comunicación e influencia para interactuar con distintas areas de negocio.
Orientación a resultados, trabajo colaborativo y en equipo.
Experiencia y solvencia con lenguajes de consulta de datos (p. ej., SQL).
Valorable nivel de inglés alto.


Tendrás las siguientes responsabilidades en seguridad dentro de la compañía:


Acceso a la información confidencial relativa al cliente del que es responsable.
Solicitud de medidas / usuarios.
Observancia del cumplimiento de las políticas de seguridad y las políticas internas.

Title: Marketing Data Analyst
Description:
About WOW:

We’re WOW, a ground-breaking concept connecting forward-thinking brands and people at the intersection of online along with offline. We’re here for the crazy ones, the early adopters, the ones who see things differently, seeking to experiment, try new things and open to being surprised. People come to WOW to see and discover what’s new & happening, hence discovering our exclusive and curated brand assortment. In short, WOW is a phygital platform that combines unique physical locations and an online marketplace (WOWconcept.com) as well as partners with Direct to Consumer and established brands to create unique phygital experiences. With a customer centric approach, our goal is to constantly surprise our clients with outstanding customer experiences plus carefully curated brand selection, which can be described as follows: New, Hard to find, Trendy, Exclusive, Desirable and Forward-thinking. Launched in 2020, we started by opening our first physical store in the heart of Madrid. The store is an 8 floor and 5.500 sqm building located at the city center in Gran Via, 18. Now we have made a strategic decision: to stay with the commercial artery of the capital by opening soon our second store, a 9 floor building located at Serrano 52. If there is one thing that was plain to us from the beginning, it was that our success depends on our people and that is why since the start we have worked to define our values, values that are present in everything we do: customer focus, “all for one”, passion and integrity. WOW is a brand-new company, yet full of great, agile, and enthusiastic professionals who drive it as a team in a single direction: to revolutionize retail.




What will you do:

Analyze the performance of Marketing campaigns and conversion rate based on KPIs to evaluate their effectiveness.
Develop and maintain dashboards and reports to track marketing results using visualization tools such as Tableau, PowerBI or similar.
Monitor and analyze sales trends to identify patterns and new growth opportunities.
Work with the Marketing team to develop strategies based on previously collected data.
Regularly evaluate data analysis tools and processes to ensure they are best suited to the company's current needs.
Interpret large volumes of data, identify trends, detect problems and propose data-driven solutions.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify data needs and provide analytical support in different areas of the business.




Who you are

Highly motivated, detail oriented, organized, with strong communication skills, familiar with a team environment.




The experience you bring

Industrial Engineer, Degree in Business Administration, Mathematics or any quantitative field.
At least 3 years of experience in data analysis.
Proficiency in Google Analytics, Google Ads, Power BI.
Knowledge of Tableau, SQL, Looker, Qlik and similar will be an asset. As well as Python, R or other scripting languages.
Experience in retail/ecommerce is an asset.
Fluency in Spanish and English.
Proactive, organized, methodical and able to present data and explain complex concepts easily.




What we offer

All for one, one for all is part of our DNA, therefore, you will have the opportunity to:

Contribute to the growth of a company with a very big ambition at a very early stage.
Join a company where people come first in a young and unbeatable work dynamic, an environment and a great talent where we really live our values.
Permanent contract.
Competitive fixed salary.
Flexible remuneration (Cobee).
Medical insurance.
Other benefits.

Now we have made a strategic decision: to stay with the commercial artery of the capital by opening soon our second store, a 9 floor building located at Serrano 52. If there is one thing that was plain to us from the beginning, it was that our success depends on our people and that is why since the start we have worked to define our values, values that are present in everything we do: customer focus, “all for one”, passion and integrity. WOW is a brand-new company, yet full of great, agile, and enthusiastic professionals who drive it as a team in a single direction: to revolutionize retail.


What will you do:

  • Analyze the performance of Marketing campaigns and conversion rate based on KPIs to evaluate their effectiveness.
  • Develop and maintain dashboards and reports to track marketing results using visualization tools such as Tableau, PowerBI or similar.
  • Monitor and analyze sales trends to identify patterns and new growth opportunities.
  • Work with the Marketing team to develop strategies based on previously collected data.
  • Regularly evaluate data analysis tools and processes to ensure they are best suited to the company's current needs.
  • Interpret large volumes of data, identify trends, detect problems and propose data-driven solutions.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify data needs and provide analytical support in different areas of the business.


Who you are

Highly motivated, detail oriented, organized, with strong communication skills, familiar with a team environment.


The experience you bring

  • Industrial Engineer, Degree in Business Administration, Mathematics or any quantitative field.
  • At least 3 years of experience in data analysis.
  • Proficiency in Google Analytics, Google Ads, Power BI.
  • Knowledge of Tableau, SQL, Looker, Qlik and similar will be an asset. As well as Python, R or other scripting languages.
  • Experience in retail/ecommerce is an asset.
  • Fluency in Spanish and English.
  • Proactive, organized, methodical and able to present data and explain complex concepts easily.


What we offer

All for one, one for all is part of our DNA, therefore, you will have the opportunity to:

  • Contribute to the growth of a company with a very big ambition at a very early stage.
  • Join a company where people come first in a young and unbeatable work dynamic, an environment and a great talent where we really live our values.
  • Permanent contract.
  • Competitive fixed salary.
  • Flexible remuneration (Cobee).
  • Medical insurance.
  • Other benefits.

Title: Beca Data Analyst
Description:
MADRID


¿Quiénes somos?

Seguro que sabes que podemos llevarte a la playa, a esquiar, a pasar unos días en tu pueblo e incluso de escapada de fin de semana con los amigos. ¿Pero a que no sabes que también somos una empresa con certificación Top Employer y presencia en Francia, Andorra, Portugal, Suiza, Marruecos y Arabía Saudí? ¡Ahora sí!

Multinacional con más de 16.000 personas, nuestro propósito es rediseñar el futuro de la movilidad para que puedas desplazarte de la manera más cómoda, innovadora, eficiente, segura y ecológica posible.

¿Tienes ganas de formar parte de un equipo y crear un impacto con tu trabajo? En Alsa buscamos jóvenes talentos con ganas de aprender y contribuir a la innovación de la marca. Si estás finalizando tus estudios o comenzando tu carrera, esta es la oportunidad que estabas buscando para llenar tu mochila de destrezas y competencias.

Desde la diversidad, la igualdad y el reconocimiento queremos que pases a formar parte de nuestro equipo. ¡Te esperamos!

¿Qué te vas a llevar de este viaje?


Análisis de BBDD relacionales.
Análisis de la calidad del dato.
Configuración de informes y cuadros de mando de visualización de datos.
Diseño de reportes a otras áreas.
Descripción funcional de requerimientos para la automatización de procesos y transferencia de datos.
Realización de queries sencillas con SQL.
Familiarización con herramientas de integración y ETL.
Participación en proyectos de optimización y transformación.


¿Qué te ofrecemos?


Beca con ayuda al estudio por 900€/mes con una duración de 6 meses y la posibilidad de renovar otros 6.
Horario de L a J de 9:00 a 18:00 y los V de 8:00 a 15:00.
Un mentor que te guiará y la oportunidad de aprender de la mano de grandes profesionales del sector que te ayudarán a desarrollar tu máximo potencial.
Oportunidad de participar en nuestros voluntariados.


¿Qué necesitas?


Estudios en Estadística, Matemáticas, Ingeniería Informática, Ciencia de Datos o similar.
Nivel de inglés medio (B2/C1).
Ser una persona proactiva y colaboradora, con ganas de contribuir al equipo.
Manejo del paquete Office a nivel medio (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, etc.).
Conocimientos de herramientas de visualización: Tableau, Power BI, etc.
Conocimiento de Python u otros lenguajes de programación (R).
Conocimientos de BBDD SQL.
Conocimiento de Herramientas de ETL y data mining.
¡Muchas, muchas ganas de aprender!


Continúa tu camino con nosotros. ¿Te subes? #hastadondetúquieras #talentoalsa

Title: Analistas de datos junior con SQL y powerbi
Description:
Empresa líder en el sector de Customer Science y en Marketing Automation, dedicada a la generación de resultados de negocio mediante la gestión avanzada de la información de clientes, liderando cambios del sector y mejora de su posición competitiva, requiere para un proyecto en Madrid analistas de datos con SQL y powerbi.

Sus Principales Responsabilidades Serán


Soporte funcional de sistemas comerciales, asistencia a la evolución funcional de sistemas comerciales y/o para el control, análisis de ventas e ingresos en empresas con varios centros.
Tratamiento y explotación de grandes bases de datos para cumplir con el servicio requerido.
Crear informes interactivos con Microsoft Power BI y aplicar prácticas UX
Exposición de resultados


Podemos Ofrecerte


Carrera profesional
Formación
Buen ambiente laboral
Retribución flexible
Flexibilidad horaria.
Jornada intensiva en julio y agosto.
Teletrabajo: híbrido.


¿Quieres conocer más? ¡Ínscribete!

Requisitos mínimos


SQL nivel avanzado (Se realizará prueba de conocimientos)
PowerBI avanzado
Excel avanzado
Valorable inglés alto
Se valorará experiencia en un puesto similar
Experiencia trabajando con metologías ágiles

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Desde SII Group Spain buscamos un/a DATA ANALYST con experiencia mínima de 3 años para formar parte de nuestro gran equipo💥




¿Quieres embarcarte en nuevos proyectos 🚀?

¡Sin duda querrás conocer más sobre esta oportunidad! 😁




¿Por qué trabajar aquí?




👉FORMACIÓN PERSONALIZADA: Dispondrás de acceso a nuestras plataformas técnicas Pluralsight & OpenWebinars y Open Sessions que te permitirán mejorar tus soft skills con cursos de Mindfulness, coaching...

👉MODELO DE TRABAJO HIBRIDO: 1 día oficina (zona Viladecans)

👉PAQUETE DE RETRIBUCIÓN FLEXIBLE: Te cuidamos y ponemos a tu disposición beneficios sociales (seguro médico privado, ticket restaurante, ticket guardería o ticket transporte).

👉SOMOS UNA FAMILIA: Cuidamos de esta gran familia organizando afterworks, cenas y eventos 🍻.




Experiencia:

Desarrollar análisis de datos complejos, aplicando distintas metodologías matemáticas y/o estadísticas para recopilar, organizar, interpretar y resumir datos numéricos para proporcionar información utilizable a las áreas de negocio.
Liderar informes y/o entregables relacionados con datos relevantes para la toma de decisiones, así como sus presentaciones a los equipos de negocio.
Apoyar al equipo de Business Insights en su desarrollo, proporcionando asistencia técnica y entendimiento entre los miembros sobre el uso eficaz de los datos y sus mejores prácticas.
Generación de visualización e interpretación de datos efectivas (diseño de sistemas, tableros, gráficos de información, mapeo, herramientas de datos y B.I.).
Ser el focal en las mesas de trabajo con las áreas de negocio para mostrar resultados y avances, siendo capaz de priorizar y planificar el trabajo/proyecto que esté bajo su gestión.
Llevar a cabo investigaciones cualitativas y cuantitativas y utilizar enfoques de métodos mixtos para el análisis de datos, según necesidades de negocio.




Requisitos:

Tener mínimo 3-4 años de experiencia laboral previa como analista de negocio o analista de datos.
Formación superior en negocios, matemáticas, económicas, finanzas, estadística o ingeniería.
Se valorará estudios de Máster/MBA. Se valora experiencia en sector aéreo, turismo y viajes.
Alta capacidad analítica y manejo en modelos de datos: sólida experiencia en SQL, Python (deseable) y gestión de Big Data.
Buena capacidad de comunicación e influencia para interactuar con varias áreas y stakeholders.
Pensamiento crítico y habilidades de Problem Solving: capacidad de entender un problema, imaginar una solución y estructurarla.
Habilidad estructurando la información, analizándola y extrayendo datos según necesidades de negocio.
Se valorará experiencia en herramientas de visualización como Tableau, Power BI o similares.
Inglés Avanzado




¿Quiénes somos?

Somos una multinacional francesa que ofrece servicios y soluciones IT en todo el mundo, con presencia en 21 países, por lo que podrás disfrutar de movilidad geográfica si quieres vivir una experiencia internacional, así como participar en proyectos internacionales de gran envergadura, como en este caso.




💙¡SOMOS UN EXCELENTE LUGAR DE TRABAJO! Certificados por Great Place to Work.💙

Title: Data Analyst - Credit
Description:
About Revolut

People deserve more from their money. More visibility, more control, more freedom. And since 2015, Revolut has been on a mission to deliver just that. With an arsenal of awesome products that span spending, saving, travel, transfers, investing, exchanging and more, we've helped 45+ million customers get more from their money. And we're not done yet.

As we continue our lightning-fast growth,‌ two things are essential to continuing our success: our people and our culture. We've been officially certified as a Great Place to Work™ in recognition of our outstanding employee experience! So far, we have 10,000+ people working around the world, from our great offices or remotely, on our mission. And we're looking for more. We want brilliant people that love building great products, love redefining success, and love turning the complexity of a chaotic world into the simplicity of a beautiful solution.

About The Role

We approach Data Science at Revolut the same way that we approach everything else. We take complex problems, and create extraordinary solutions that our customers love. Our Data Analysts aren’t kept in the background, doomed to never see the impact of their work. They’re some of our best and brightest problem solvers, deployed to the front-lines to work in Product Teams and deliver rock star solutions 🤘

We’re looking for a superstar Data Analyst who does not believe there is a data task that can be too hard 🦬 From digging into our complex databases, looking for the root cause of a problem to designing their own solutions and writing their own code to implement them. In this process they never stop learning, picking up new skills and delivering value.

Up for the challenge? Get in touch 👇

What You’ll Be Doing


Understanding our business and its processes through our data
Applying this understanding and knowledge of data to help product and service teams
Designing key metrics to measure different aspects of the business
Creating and maintaining new aggregated views and tables to simplify data querying
Maintaining and creating new dashboards to track metrics and visualise insights
Promoting data literacy across the company, organising and holding workshops


What You'll Need


Previous experience in an analytical role, creating impactful solutions
A strong background/education in a quantitative discipline
5+ years of experience with SQL
Great skills with Python or other programming languages
Evidence of strong mathematical and statistics knowledge


Building a global financial super app isn’t enough. Our Revoluters are a priority, and that’s why in 2021 we launched our inaugural D&I Framework, designed to help us thrive and grow everyday. We're not just doing this because it's the right thing to do. We’re doing it because we know that seeking out diverse talent and creating an inclusive workplace is the way to create exceptional, innovative products and services for our customers. That’s why we encourage applications from people with diverse backgrounds and experiences to join this multicultural, hard-working team.

Refer to our <a class="postings-link" href="https://www.revolut.com/legal/data-privacy-for-candidates">Data Privacy Statement for Candidates for details on our data handling practices during your application.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
¿Por qué Capitole?

🤝 Nuestra gente lo primero. Ponemos a las personas en el centro de todo lo que hacemos

👨‍💻 Proyectos interesantes. Tecnologías de vanguardia. Metodologías ágiles

😁 Felicidad y baja tasa de rotación

🎓 1200€ anuales de formación a la carta

⌚ Horario flexible

🌏 Más de 900 profesionales preparados, con hasta 27 nacionalidades

🎯 Trayectoria profesional a medida

📆 Seguimientos mensuales. Balance anual con evaluación 360º

🩺 Seguro médico privado

💰 Retribución flexible

📢 Comunidades técnicas

🦾 Plan Andjoy

🥳 Un montón de eventos increíbles




Estamos buscando un/a Data Analyst en Zaragoza para un reconocido cliente del sector aéreo, turismo y viajes. Disfrutarás de horarios flexibles con jornada intensiva los viernes y en verano.




Responsabilidades y funciones




Generación de visualización e interpretación de datos efectivas, dando sentido al flujo de análisis y storytelling que ayude a las áreas de negocio.
Liderar junto con el Product Owner las relaciones con los equipos de negocio para asegurar un pleno entendimiento del área.
Apoyar al equipo en la resolución de problemas y desafíos relacionados con reporting y análisis de la información, teniendo una mirada crítica e impulsando las mejores prácticas del uso y consumo de datos.
Velar por el cumplimiento de los estándares de trabajo, procesos y correcta utilización de herramientas definidos desde el equipo de central de Business Insights, para asegurar procesos eficientes y escalables.




Requisitos




Tener mínimo 3 años de experiencia laboral previa como analista de datos utilizando herramientas de visualización como Tableau o Power BI.
Experiencia y solvencia con lenguajes de consulta de datos (p. ej., SQL).
Pensamiento crítico y habilidades de Problem Solving: capacidad de entender un problema, imaginar una solución y estructurarla.
Orientación a resultados, trabajo colaborativo y en equipo.
Muy valorable un nivel de inglés que te permita presentar datos a negocio.




Horario: Flexible, jornada intensiva los viernes.

Horario de verano: Sí.

Modalidad: híbrida, se requiere presencialidad de 1 día a la semana.

Ubicación: Av Ranillas, Zaragoza

Siéntete libre de mandarnos tu perfil. ¡Estamos deseando conocerte! 💙

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Who we are




At CoverWallet we are determined to revolutionize the insurance industry! We launched in 2015 and since then we are the leading digital platform for contracting insurance for small and medium-sized companies. Thanks to state-of-the-art technology and meticulous design we have turned insurance management and processing into a simple, fast and convenient process for our clients. All online, in minutes!




Our passion is in delivering innovation and value creation through technology, and our mission is to become the world’s leading InsurTech. For this, we have built an incredible team of ~800 people based in New York, Spain, Poland and Singapore. Success is guaranteed as we are part of AON, the global leaders in risk, retirement and health solutions with 50,000 colleagues worldwide. We combine the mindset and culture of a high-growth startup with the backing and support of a global multinational. The best of both worlds in one company - what more could we ask for?




About the role




As a Data Analyst, you will be responsible for building robust analytical platforms to support data-driven initiatives across the company. In this role, you will deliver strategic analysis on high priority initiatives across the entire organization. You will be working closely with Product, Marketing, Sales, and Operations in providing them with visibility to real-time data. You will be expected to deliver data-driven insights that will play an integral role in defining the company’s data model.




A typical day




Use Looker to build critical dashboards that will measure business performance, hold teams accountable, and generate insights.
Democratize data through skillful data structuring by developing Looker explores to support our internal stakeholders.
Own data analysis and visualization, and communicate the outcomes/insights to various stakeholders that will be utilized to make strategic decisions for improvements.
Partner with the Analytics and Data Engineering teams to understand current problems with our existing data platform, identity solutions, and deliver high quality data foundations to data stakeholders across multiple business lines.
Work cross-functionally with Product, Sales, Operations, and Marketing to provide them with visibility to real-time data on existing and new processes.




What you need to succeed




About 2 - 4 years of experience in a data analyst role.
Bachelor’s Degree in a quantitative field.
Highly proficient in SQL
Experience using visualization tools, preferably Looker, Tableau, or Power BI.
Experience working in Agile environments, preferably with Jira.
Extra Credit - Exposure to data modeling and transformation tools like dbt and experience with data analysis and building data pipelines with Python.
Strong written and verbal communication skills.
Problem solver with excellent analytical skills.
Hability to work in a fast-paced environment.
Comfortable working on multiple projects simultaneously.
Strong quantitative reasoning skills and experience using data to provide insights to executive leadership and other departments.




About the recruitment process




Your first contact with CoverWallet will be through an HR interview with one of our colleagues from the Talent Acquisition area, who will tell you everything about our company and its history, as well as the details of the position, functions and your future conditions. We would love to know your professional and academic career, and of course, your motivations and expectations for a new professional project. We will be happy to answer all your questions!
Do we have a match? Let’s move on to your First Technical Interview! You will meet two of the leaders from our amazing Data Analytics Team, who will explain to you in more detail what the team's day-to-day and their responsibilities. They will be very interested in expanding information about your experience as a Data Analyst as well as your knowledge of our main technological environments.
If everything has gone well and you have impressed our colleagues... we advance to the second stage of the process! We will send you a data challenge based on a case study to find out your technical level on SQL and you will have a maximum of 4 days to complete it.
If you've made it this far, things are getting interesting... It's time for your Final Interview! In this case, you will have the opportunity to meet our Head of Data, who will close the selection process with an interview aimed at getting to know you not only on a professional and technical level, but also on a personal level, so that both of you can reach the conclusion of whether the purpose of our project fits with your professional aspirations.




Why CoverWallet




At CoverWallet you will have the opportunity to be a key player in the transformation of one of the largest industries and in one of the most developed digital markets in the world. You will work in a cutting-edge tech environment, alongside a super powerful and diverse global team. Join us and build your own career plan in one of the world's leading companies, tailored to your dreams and aspirations. And just for good measure…




💰 Competitive salary based on your background and experience, and a variable annual bonus set according to your goals
⏰ Enjoy flexible working hours and find out your ideal way of working thanks to our smart work model: full remote or hybrid, it’s up to you!
🎁 Perks package consisting of a Company-paid Life, Accident Insurance and Medical Cover with free dental care. Complement your benefits with our flexible compensation plan (tickets restaurant, transport card, daycare checks, external training and even a Pension Scheme!)
📚 Carry on with your training thanks to your additional budget of 1,500€ per year to finance training courses, certifications, books or any teaching aids that will help you continue to grow professionally
🛒 Enjoy a lot of offers and save on your purchases thanks to our discount platform on your favorite brands (travel, fashion, technology, leisure...)
🏝 23 paid vacation days per year, plus 2 additional personal days and 2 wellbeing days to focus on your own health and prioritize self-care :)
🍏 Great office in Madrid, where you will find all the coffee, drinks, snacks and fruit you want. Come and enjoy all the activities we do, both inside and outside the office (hackathons, meetups, tech talks, code katas and much more!)

Title: Técnico analista de datos
Description:
Descripción de la empresa

Con más de 150 años de trayectoria en Agbar seguimos anticipándonos y adaptándonos para dar respuesta a las necesidades de nuestro entorno, con el objetivo de mejorar la calidad de vida de las personas. Con la fuerza de las alianzas impulsamos soluciones innovadoras para la gestión sostenible del agua y el medio ambiente, en línea con los Objetivos de Desarrollo Sostenible de Naciones Unidas.

, Descripción del empleo

Entrarás a formar parte de un departamento junto 4 personas donde nos encargamos de más de 40 informes Power BI que dan servicio a más de 800 usuarios.Estamos en constante crecimiento, tanto en número de usuarios como informes, así como de la cantidad de datos que gestionamos y analizamos.

Es por ello que buscamos un apasionado de los datos y el análisis que sea capaz de crear modelos de estrella y galaxias de datos eficientes, y mostrar la información de la forma más clara posible. Participaras en informes relacionados con el ámbito técnico, clientes, económico, financiero, etc...

Palabras como KPI, Gateways, INNER, CALCULATE, SWITCH, serán habituales.

, Requisitos

Buscamos un/a : ingeniero, ingeniero matemático, matemático y experto en data science.


Conocimientos de Power BI
Power Query M
DAX
RLS
ETL
Gateways
Conocimientos de Bases de Datos
SQL
Creación de modelos
PowerApps y AppSheets


Conocimientos que se valoraran:


Access
Microstrategy
VBS
Python
Agile
ML
Marketing
Finanzas


Información adicional

¿Qué podemos ofrecerte?

Posibilidad de incorporarte a una empresa líder en servicios medioambientales y sostenible, y a un equipo multidisciplinar

Posición estable, contrato indefinido.

Oportunidades de desarrollo y crecimiento profesional dentro del Grupo.

Plan de formación y de carrera.

Calendarios que facilitan la conciliación.

Ambiente dinámico.

Retos profesionales.

Flexibilidad horaria.

Modelo de trabajo Híbrido con teletrabajo.

Programas de retribución flexible

Como empresa inclusiva, Veolia está comprometida con la diversidad y valora todas las solicitudes sin discriminación.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Desde HAYS estamos colaborando con una compañía líder global en consultoría tecnológica, dedicada al desarrollo tecnológico de soluciones adaptadas a las necesidades empresariales del cliente, desde la estrategia y el diseño hasta la gestión de operaciones. Para hacerlo, cuentan con una profunda experiencia en la industria y un dominio de los campos en constante evolución de la nube, los datos, la inteligencia artificial, la conectividad, el software, la ingeniería digital y las plataformas.




Actualmente buscamos un/a Data Analyst para incorporarse a su equipo, a través de una modalidad laboral 100% remoto.




¿Cuáles serán tus funciones?

Liderar iniciativas de análisis de modelos de datos, especialmente en el contexto de una migración de datos.
Investigar y proponer soluciones de mapeo de datos para cumplir con los modelos de datos objetivo.
Participar activamente en conversaciones con expertos en calidad de datos, propietarios de datos y responsables de datos, así como con expertos en la materia.
Brindar soporte durante los ciclos de pruebas para aclarar dudas y resolver incidencias.
Informar sobre el progreso a la alta dirección.




¿Cuáles son los requisitos?

Titulación universitaria en tecnología, preferiblemente en informática.
Más de 3 años de experiencia laboral como analista de datos.
Experiencia en análisis y diseño de sistemas de recopilación de datos.
Historial de desarrollo de análisis de alta calidad que ha resultado en definiciones y migraciones exitosas de modelos de datos.
Mantenimiento de relaciones internas y externas para garantizar el cumplimiento en todas las actividades.
Fuertes habilidades analíticas con la capacidad de recopilar, organizar, analizar y difundir cantidades significativas de información con atención al detalle y precisión.




¿Qué ofrecemos?

Proyecto estable.
Modalidad 100% remoto.
Contratación inicialmente con HAYS, y luego pasas a cliente final.







Estamos esperando perfiles como el tuyo, apasionados con la tecnología y que quiera enfrentarse a un nuevo reto. Si es tu caso, responde a este email enviando tu CV para que podamos contarte más!

Title: Junior Data Analyst
Description:
We’re looking for a talented Junior Data Analyst to help us change the world of digital advertising together!




WHO WE ARE

Seedtag is the leading Contextual Advertising Platform. Our proprietary, machine learning-based technology provides human-like understanding of the content in the web, the highest level of brand safety in the industry and unmatched cookieless targeting capabilities.

We engage with the market on both demand and supply side to create, activate and launch high-quality advertising campaigns at scale. We are committed to creating a more beautiful, respectful and engaging way to do advertising.




KEY FIGURES

2014 · Founded by two ex-Googlers

2018 · 16M total turnover & Internationalization & Getting growth

2021 · Fundraising round of 40M€ & +11 countries & +260 Seedtaggers

2022 · Fundraising round of 250M€ + expansion into the U.S market




YOUR CHALLENGE

You will propose new analysis to get the most out of our current data and define what additional data will be needed to improve our current Contextual Understanding
Your data visualization skills will be key to grasp the attention of the public and transmit complex information into simple explanations
You will get full ownership of our contextual data to offer insights and communication strategies to our most relevant clients
You will present your results internally and externally, co-creating contextual strategies with big clients (from Nissan to Coca-Cola, Heineken, Tag Heuer, etc.)
You will help us build contextual tools that would allow the democratization of data inside the company: from sales, to marketing, to operations, the different teams should be using contextual data in their day-to-day
Some experience building extract, transform, load (ETL) data pipelines will be needed here.
You will analyze performance of our current Contextual products and actively proposing improvements together with the Product Team
Finally, you will build a strong knowledge of the ecosystem and sector to develop a strong instinct of how to improve our products and positioning. Creativity here will also be a must!
During all these tasks, you will be using the latest technologies developed by our Machine Learning Engineers: amazing NLP and CV models to get the most out of massive amounts of data!




YOU WILL SUCCEED IN THIS ROLE IF

You have a relevant degree in engineering, mathematics, statistics or an analytics related field
You have between 1 and 3 years of work experience in Data Analysis or a related field
You are proficient in SQL and Python: data treatment and data visualizations are a must
You have an analytical mind capable of structuring complex problems into simple, iterative, solutions
You have full proficiency in Spanish and English
You are energetic, proactive and eager to work in a dynamic environment
You are a real team player with good communication and cooperation skills
You have proven ability to work in a fast-paced, informal, dynamic and exigent environment
You like to have fun while working and don’t take yourself too serious!




It would be a big plus if you

Have previous experience in a startup or have a background in consulting
Have previous experience in presenting and communicating data analysis results and insights to external stakeholders




SEEDTAG PERKS

🚀 Key moment to join Seedtag in terms of growth and opportunities

💯 One Seedtag: Work for a month from any of our open offices with travel and stay paid if you’re a top performer (think of Brazil, NY..., 🏖️)

⌛ Flexible schedule to balance work and personal life

🇬🇧 🇪🇸 🇫🇷 Optional company-paid English, Spanish and/or French courses

📚 Access to learning opportunities (learning & development budget)

🍻 We love what we do, but we also love having fun. We have many team activities you can join and enjoy with your colleagues! A Yearly offsite with all the company, team offsites, and Christmas events.

🏋 Gympass




BENEFITS OF WORKING AT SEEDTAG

Growth: International, highly demanding work environment in one of the fastest growing AdTech companies in Europe. We reject "that’s the way it’s always been done". In Seedtag you can find an energetic, fresh workplace, multicultural work environment where our members are from different countries in Europe, LATAM, US and so many more!
Impact: The chance to have a direct impact, here you don't work for the sake of working, we all have an impact on seedtag in our own way, rowing in the same direction.
Diversity of methodology and people: Seedtag DNA is unique and highly appreciated by very different types of Seedtagers. We embrace diversity and encourage everyone to seek the best version of themselves and to show who they really are. With a total flexible methodology.
Flexibility: At Seedtag, we trust you, you can work from home, the beach or the office. The important thing is to work on your goals.




Are you ready to join the SEEDTAG adventure? Then send us your CV!

2022 · Fundraising round of 250M€ + expansion into the U.S market


YOUR CHALLENGE

  • You will propose new analysis to get the most out of our current data and define what additional data will be needed to improve our current Contextual Understanding
  • Your data visualization skills will be key to grasp the attention of the public and transmit complex information into simple explanations
  • You will get full ownership of our contextual data to offer insights and communication strategies to our most relevant clients
  • You will present your results internally and externally, co-creating contextual strategies with big clients (from Nissan to Coca-Cola, Heineken, Tag Heuer, etc.)
  • You will help us build contextual tools that would allow the democratization of data inside the company: from sales, to marketing, to operations, the different teams should be using contextual data in their day-to-day
  • Some experience building extract, transform, load (ETL) data pipelines will be needed here.
  • You will analyze performance of our current Contextual products and actively proposing improvements together with the Product Team
  • Finally, you will build a strong knowledge of the ecosystem and sector to develop a strong instinct of how to improve our products and positioning. Creativity here will also be a must!
  • During all these tasks, you will be using the latest technologies developed by our Machine Learning Engineers: amazing NLP and CV models to get the most out of massive amounts of data!


YOU WILL SUCCEED IN THIS ROLE IF

  • You have a relevant degree in engineering, mathematics, statistics or an analytics related field
  • You have between 1 and 3 years of work experience in Data Analysis or a related field
  • You are proficient in SQL and Python: data treatment and data visualizations are a must
  • You have an analytical mind capable of structuring complex problems into simple, iterative, solutions
  • You have full proficiency in Spanish and English
  • You are energetic, proactive and eager to work in a dynamic environment
  • You are a real team player with good communication and cooperation skills
  • You have proven ability to work in a fast-paced, informal, dynamic and exigent environment
  • You like to have fun while working and don’t take yourself too serious!


It would be a big plus if you

  • Have previous experience in a startup or have a background in consulting
  • Have previous experience in presenting and communicating data analysis results and insights to external stakeholders


SEEDTAG PERKS

🚀 Key moment to join Seedtag in terms of growth and opportunities

💯 One Seedtag: Work for a month from any of our open offices with travel and stay paid if you’re a top performer (think of Brazil, NY..., 🏖️)

⌛ Flexible schedule to balance work and personal life

🇬🇧 🇪🇸 🇫🇷 Optional company-paid English, Spanish and/or French courses

📚 Access to learning opportunities (learning & development budget)

🍻 We love what we do, but we also love having fun. We have many team activities you can join and enjoy with your colleagues! A Yearly offsite with all the company, team offsites, and Christmas events.

🏋 Gympass


BENEFITS OF WORKING AT SEEDTAG

  • Growth: International, highly demanding work environment in one of the fastest growing AdTech companies in Europe. We reject "that’s the way it’s always been done". In Seedtag you can find an energetic, fresh workplace, multicultural work environment where our members are from different countries in Europe, LATAM, US and so many more!
  • Impact: The chance to have a direct impact, here you don't work for the sake of working, we all have an impact on seedtag in our own way, rowing in the same direction.
  • Diversity of methodology and people: Seedtag DNA is unique and highly appreciated by very different types of Seedtagers. We embrace diversity and encourage everyone to seek the best version of themselves and to show who they really are. With a total flexible methodology.
  • Flexibility: At Seedtag, we trust you, you can work from home, the beach or the office. The important thing is to work on your goals.


Are you ready to join the SEEDTAG adventure? Then send us your CV!

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Join CGI!




Do you want to be part of one of the five largest IT and business process companies in the world?




At CGI we are looking for a Data Analyst to work in one of our most advanced professional teams for a client in the energy sector.




Responsibilities




Listen to stakeholders and develop a deep understanding of their needs and priorities
Prioritize needs coming from stakeholders
Perform functional research and design to determine possible solutions
Construct ad-hoc financial models and analyses to support deliverables
Perform functional testing and user acceptance testing
Conduct data discovery and profiling for fit and gap analysis
Tenaciously solve problems and make decisions under uncertainty
Actively contribute to team ceremonies including: sprint planning, daily stand-up, sprint review and retrospectives
Demonstrate a strong ownership in understanding business needs and driving business valued outcome
Communicate on outcomes to stakeholders to ensure understanding of progress and potential roadblocks




Qualifications




University degree in Accounting, Finance, Economics or equivalent
5+ years of accounting or finance experience
2+ years of hands on experience with SAP ECC or S/4
Excellent proficiency with Microsoft Excel
Comfortable writing SQL queries
Experience with PySpark
Fluent in English




We offer:




Permanent contract 📃🖊

Hybrid Working model 💻🏠🏔🏨🏢

Flexible remuneration (childcare, restaurant , transport cards, etc.) 👶🥗🚌

Participation in the purchase of company shares 📈📊

Training and development in various technologies 💻🖱⌨📱

CGI Membership Benefits Club

Excellent working environment 🥰🤗🤗

Life and accident insurance 🏥




If you have the ability to work and the desire to continue learning in a dynamic and constantly growing company? This is your opportunity! 🤞✨




At CGI we are waiting for you!

Title: Analista de datos-INDEFINIDO
Description:
¿Eres analítico/a, los números te hablan y apuestas por el manejo, estudio e interpretación de los mismos para aportar y mejorar el día a día de tu empresa?

Si la respuesta es sí, ¡Esta oferta te interesa!




Buscamos incorporar un/a Analista de datos para una importante empresa del sector industrial ubicada en la zona del Corredor del Henares.




Las principales funciones del puesto son:

Procesamiento de grandes bases de datos
Análisis de datos y extracción de conclusiones
Realización de resúmenes ejecutivos de reportes del mercado.
Presentación de resultado de estudios.
Estar al día con las novedades y tendencias del mercado, tanto por parte de la industria del (competidores) como de fabricantes (clientes).




Se requiere:

Titulación universitaria en ingeniería, matemáticas, estadística o similar, ADE.
Experiencia previa de 5-8 años en:
Estudios de mercados
Inteligencia competitiva
Análisis de datos para mercadeo.
Nivel de EXCEL Alto
Inglés alto
Ideal: alimentación o consumo masivo o similares
Valorable experiencias en: Kantar, Nielsen, Ipsos, GfK, Euromonitor, IRI/Circana, Empresa de Consumo Masivo en la función descrita y no en desarrollo de negocio.




Se ofrece:

Contratación INDEFINIDA por parte de la empresa.
Zona de trabajo: Corredor del Henares
Horario: flexibilidad entrada/salida y Viernes Intensiva de mañana.
Salario fijo+ variable.
Teletrabajo( 1 día/sem).

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
At EA, we thrive on outrageous thinking. It’s the fuel that inspires the best games in the world. We’re innovators and great storytellers. But it’s not just about amazing your peers, it’s about amazing yourself. Take risks. Collaborate with great minds and dare to dream big. Do you want to come with us? Together, we are changing the way millions play every day.

EA inspires the world to play, and the Worldwide Localization Team makes that happen! We are accountable for delivering the high-quality localized versions of our titles to over 30 countries around the world. You will find a vibrant, multicultural environment with a great mixture of professionals. From software engineers, project managers, testers to audio, text and linguistic specialists, each employee has an important role to play. EA has built a cutting-edge Localization powerhouse that covers the needs for both current and next-generation platform

Are you a dedicated and experienced Data Analyst looking for an exciting opportunity to join a dynamic team? We are seeking a talented individual to become a key player in our Loc Data & AI team at Electronic Arts (EA). This role is pivotal to our data-driven decision-making process, where you will analyze data to uncover insights that enhance our gaming.

Responsibilities


Data Analysis: Analyze complex data sets to identify trends, patterns, and correlations.
Visualization: Create compelling data visualizations and reports that effectively communicate findings to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Usability: Design and develop user-friendly dashboards, reports, and tools to facilitate data-driven decision-making.
Storytelling: Craft compelling narratives to convey complex data insights and recommendations to various audiences.
Ownership: Deliver end-to-end data projects, from initial data requirements gathering and validation to final analysis and presentation.
Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams to integrate data insights into business strategies.
Data Quality: Ensure data accuracy, integrity, and compliance with organizational standards.
Tool Development: Develop and maintain tools, scripts, and documentation to support data analysis and visualization.


Qualifications And Skills


Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field with relevant experience or a Master’s degree.
A minimum of 5 years of experience in providing valuable insights that have demonstrably enhanced outcomes.
Excellent level of English.
Technical Proficiency:
Microsoft Power BI: Expertise in Power Query M, DAX, dataset modeling, reports, and dashboards design, with the ability to design prototypes to support requirements.
APIs: Understanding of REST APIs and SOAP APIs, with the ability to read and understand technical specifications.
Data Analysis and SQL: Strong expertise in data analysis and SQL programming.
UX/UI Design: Sound knowledge of UX/UI design for analytics solutions.
Version Control and CI/CD: Proficiency with Git and CI/CD (multi-branch approach).
Soft Skills:
Teamwork: Strong team worker with a delivery-focused mindset.
Agile Experience: Experience working within Agile teams.
Stakeholder Communication: Ability to articulate conversations with business stakeholders beyond the technical level discussion of the user stories.
Communication: Robust communication skills, with the ability to explain complex concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Strategic Thinking: Strong strategic and problem-solving skills, with the ability to anticipate potential issues and create effective solutions.
Exceptional ability in data visualization and design, with a focus on crafting compelling data narratives.
Mastery in leveraging Business Intelligence tools to drive data analysis and strategic decision-making.


Connect your future to ours. Inspire. Dream. Play
